123445678.title: bad mascara
123445678.description: This mascara is awful! I thought it would be amazing and was so excited that it was very high quality and expensive but it was such a disappointment. One coat on and it was so clumpy! Also, by the end of the day my under eyes were black from the mascara! Just horrible

beckamn.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

Izziey.title: Wanted to love it, but...
Izziey.description:
This mascara does everything that it claims. It makes your lashes look full, long, and fluffy. HOWEVER, it has ruined so many pairs of contact lenses for me... it flakes off and smudges onto the lens, making them blurry and useless! If I didn't wear contacts I would use this mascara, but I can't afford to keep throwing the lens away. I wouldn't recommend this for girls who wear contacts, but for those of you with glasses or 20/20 vision, go for it!!
…read more

dkww.title: Mascara
dkww.description: Stays on, no smudging. Good quality. Excellent looking

Euphora.title: Dramatic but...
Euphora.description:
The brush is odd and it's very easy to overdo it. Every time I take the brush I think "Ok, how am I gonna use it this time.." But it's actually not that bad, just sort of intimidating and weird. Pros: *Packaging is definitely beautiful, as with all Too Faced products<3 *Seriously lengthens *Creates a sort of "fanned out" effect *Dramatic *Slight curl CONS *Sometimes TOO much product on brush (I noticed that if you take the brush out slowly, less product is on the brush as opposed to taking it out fast) *Apply more than 2 coats. You will regret it. *Not buildable *Somewhat clumpy I walked into Sephora not even thinking of trying this. I purchased one of the last few after I decided I might as well try a new mascara since I needed one. I had Hypnose Star on by Lancome...then I tried this mascara and I was shocked. My lashes perked up and appeared longer, opening up my eye! And I wasn't even using the brush that came with it! I INSTANTLY put it in my bag. I just hope I don't have any problems with clumping from too much product on the bristles as other reviewers. But right now, I definitely recommend! :)
…read more

sunflowersweat.title: The best I've used.
sunflowersweat.description:
Without fail, my lashes look longer, curled, dark, and multiplied with this mascara. Every time. When I first bought it I put it on in an excited rush and clumped all my lashes by applying in quick, shallow strokes. I feel this may be the issue for people who say the product clumps. The wand also collects bits of mascara at the end like any other, I just brush it back into the tube. The key here is to take your time. The wand really scoops and individualizes lashes so usually a second coat isn't necessary. Definitely recommend!
…read more

lanibeth.title: Best Mascara in a Long Time
lanibeth.description:
I am a mascara fanatic. I never leave the house without it. I love this mascara because it doesn't flake, the wand "grabs" your lashes to get tons of color on them, it's more wet than dry, but it does not uncurl my hard-to-curl lashes. The first week I had it, it was almost too wet and thick and clumped easily, but now it is the perfect consistency. With one coat, I get dramatic voluminous lashes that I can wear every day. With multiple coats, you have a night-out look. It's not the easiest to get on the bottom lashes, but it's not terrible if you take your time. Color is intense, and it's definitely worth the month. I've had to product for about 3 weeks now and love it.
…read more

marcoelho.title: SO DISAPPOINTED
marcoelho.description:
So I've tested this mascara out a couple of times. I LOVED the travel size so I decided to buy the full size. Such a disappointment. It was fine to begin with but then I started to notice that there was just WAY too much mascara on the brush. I thought maybe my wiper had broke or I don't know something like that but the mascara was just clumped on the brush and wasn't being wiped off like it was supposed to be. I just recently purchased the waterproof version and was so excited to try it and the SAME exact thing happened again. It's so disappointing that there are such good reviews online and on youtube but no one has ever seemed to mention this problem. It cannot be possible that I am the only person experiencing this problem and it certainly cannot be possible that the same issue happened to just me, MORE THAN ONCE. I will definitely not be repurchasing this ever again.
…read more

eponton.title: disappointed
eponton.description: Got this mascara since it has great reviews, and I have to say it didn't live up to my expectations. It flakes off not long after putting it on leaving me with a raccoon look. Yes, the volume and lengthening are good, but what good is that if it only last an hour or two? I wouldn't recommend this.

KKSSSSS.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

keekeesierra.title: Despite a few bad reviews, I decided to try this mascara. Long story short, I'm glad I did. However, it did take a few uses to get used to the brush and formula. The brush is large and the formula is a bit dry, but it does give a false-eyelash-like effect. It's my daily mascara now. I would give it five stars, but unfortunately it does tend to flake. Some applications are better than others. I would get the sample size and see if you like it before committing to it.

Nilewater.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

TheTempest.title: YESSS
TheTempest.description:
I really needed a new mascara and I especially love love volume. I like length as well but to have thick lashes, just looks amazing. So an associate told me about better than S** so I said why not, I could always return it I suppose. No. No I won't be returning this. I went to a nearby store in excitement to use their mirror and within seconds, I fell in love. It's all in that brush. I honestly can't see why people wouldn't give this 5 stars. The volume is wild & it gave me some length as well. I don't have major lashes as it is, I think you need to just know how to apply it correctly, then you would get more out of your mascaras. But better than s** is amazing. Point blank.
…read more

SNGDD.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL
SNGDD.description: It's a no from me dawg

loriedee.title: Terrible
loriedee.description: Clumpy. Every time I used this mascara, someone would tell me that I had mascara under my eyes. This has not happened to me ever even with drug store brands. I am not one to return make-up, but I took this one back to Sephora.

ogzy.title: awful awful awful
ogzy.description: This mascara is is horrendous. I normally love big brushes but this one neither separated nor curled. My lashes ended looking short and stumpy and the mascara formula weighed them down and clumped. That and it gave me massive racoon eyes.

mrsessie.title: Best Mascara Ever
mrsessie.description: I'm a makeup artist and this is thee best mascara I have ever used! It looks like false lashes. Full, voluminous, and flirty. My brides love it. I have used other highend brands like Dior, MUFE, Lancôme, and Bobbi brown but this tops them all.

addiegb.title: Great
addiegb.description: I LOVE THIS MASCARA its by far the best mascara I have ever had

Northbays97.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

tenerife.title: Good, but not good enough
tenerife.description:
This mascara does AMAZING things to my lashes! It definitely lives up to the hype, but I did have a few issues before I give it 5 stars. First of all, there's literally nothing in this tube. I use mascara almost daily, and take good care of it (ex I don't pump the brush in and out) and this lasted me about 1 and a half months. For $23, I would expect it to have more product in it. Another issue is the extreme clumpiness that this mascara can have. On a good day, it lengthens and volumizes my lashes, but on a bad day it is a clumpy NIGHTMARE. If I'm on the run to get to work, I don't want to have to worry about having clumpy mascara, I just want to throw it on and be done with it. On days when I do a full face, this isn't an issue because I can usually take the time to use an eyelash comb and seperate them. But for people on the move, this can be hard. If this mascara had a little more product and was more reliable, I would definitely give it 5 stars
…read more

ContactRose.title: Fake Before and After Picture
ContactRose.description:
I used my points to try out the sample size of this mascara and I loved it! However, after purchasing the full size I was VERY disappointed. I have short lashes and this mascara did nothing for me. It smears though out the day giving me panda eyes. I even topped it with a waterproof mascara. Curls does not last. The picture on the case is very deceiving. If you have beautiful long and thick lashes already then I would say this will work for you but if you have hooded eyelids and super short lashes it won't work for you. Sex is definite better then this mascara.
…read more

whyhellohannah.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

andrealowell.title: Tutorial
andrealowell.description:
This mascara is best a week after opening. Upon first opening, there can be a lot of mascara on such a full spoolie, which can really trip ppl up. If you felt frustrated with this, try it again. It may have thickened up just a pitch for better control. Best for long lashes because of size of brush. I always have two in stock, because I'll use the almost gone mascara to use on lower lashes and use a comb and styler for my lashes. For an extra dramatic look, roll the brush repetitively over and through lashes to layer on the mascara. I have tried 50 mascaras and this is one of the best ones out there, currently, if you know how to use it.
…read more

chellebelle16.title: Disappointed
chellebelle16.description: I have been wanting to try this mascara for months, finally purchased it and I'm definitely disappointed. My lashes are pretty good naturally, nice and long I just want volume. Maybe I need to try it a bit longer but honestly I'm not thrilled. It definitely transfers to my under eyes by noon and I have mascaras that I like much better with the same problem that I could use. Thinking about returning.

snokiesunshine.title: Am repurchasing
snokiesunshine.description:
I purchased a sample and am waiting for my next one to come in the mail! I love this mascara. It adds volume to my lashes and lifts them right up! I usually only apply one coat. It also feels very soft and velvety on my lashes. The applicator has an hourglass shape and I feel like it makes it easier to reach the corners of my eyes without overcoating. Plus the packaging is so pretty! I think this will be my mascara from now on.
…read more

ElysianDayGlow.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

sp2270.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL
sp2270.description: Definitely thickens my lashes and love that. Surprisingly like the brush. I took off 1 star because the product in the tube seems to dry pretty quickly, flakes hours later and is not easy to get it off. I use micellar water to remove.

sheeeeners.title: Usually use Dior mascara
sheeeeners.description:
Let me start off by saying my lashes are long but I lack thickness because I used to get eyelash extensions and they would tear out clumps of my lashes. Just like how hair extensions can cause bald patches in your scalp so can extensions if you repeatedly get them. No matter how good the aesthetician it's going to damage your own lashes so if it's not broken don't fix it. Anyways, I seek volume so I usually use Diorshow's white conditioning fibre base than use the Dior's Classic black mascara. It's really good at creating length and volume but it's really pricey and finishes really quickly. There dosen't seem to be a lot of product in the tube. So I gave too faced a try. First, it a really thick formula. This is definitely for a false lashes type of effect not a natural look. I like that type of look so I was happy about that. The only thing is, it can be kind of clumpy so I tried using the white Dior mascara then used this over too. Perfection! By itself it was too clumpy but with the base I was able to apply two coats of this stuff without a problem. If you have problems with clumsiness or you have short stumpy lashes use a conditioning base underneath. I think this mascara is better for those with long lashes without volume than those with short thick lashes unless you lengthen them first. Lastly, it can be a bit dry and flaky because it's so thick but again, the conditioning base keeps it on better sort of like a primer does for your eyeshadow or foundation. As for the clumsiness I just use an eyelash comb. If you don't want to buy one use an a clean toothbrush for brushing out your lashes it works wonders.
…read more

LoveSephora1221.title: Clumpy
LoveSephora1221.description: When you're in a hurry and want some really fast volume, sure throw a coat of this on. But if you're trying to achieve perfect lashes this is not the one for you. I LOVE mascara and the sales assoc recommended this. Bad idea. It is very clumpy. I'll stick with Lancôme Doll Lashes or just plain Sephora Lash Plumper. They're Real by Benefit is also a favorite.

maddieolivia.title: worth the price
maddieolivia.description:
I kind of hoped I wouldn't love this mascara so I could happily go back to my drugstore brand, but I can't go back. I LOVE this mascara. It is by no means waterproof, so don't wear it to the pool, but it is long-lasting. I've worn it in the heat and it stayed on all day. My eyelashes have never looked better. They are clump-free and full! I actually found that I really like that it's not waterproof because it comes off easily with makeup wipes, leaving my lashes feeling fresh. This is an absolute must-have.
…read more

OhCara22.title: Love it!
OhCara22.description: This is good stuff! I usually only wear waterproof mascara but this is awesome! Stays put, rich black, and holds a curl. A lot of length and good volume. Definitely ordering when my sample runs out!

nat320.title: My ONLY mascara!
nat320.description: After buying 100 mascaras of different $$ range and ingredients this is my holy grail. It separates, lengthens and volumes. A must buy n my bag!!!

Pharebear.title: Overpriced disappointment
Pharebear.description:
When I went to Myrtle Beach a lady in a massive beauty store recommended that I try Too Faced Better than Sex Mascara, Retail Value: $23. When I came back into town I went to my local Sephora. I cannot express fully how disappointed I am in this product. From the moment I twisted open the tube of mascara it was already think and clumpy all over the brush. Despite my better judgment, I proceeded to apply the makeup. Immediately ran into issues simply applying it with the "hour glass" brush. Not only was it the most difficult to apply evenly but it smudged all over the place and made my eyelashes clump together. For such an expensive product, one would think they were getting a top notch "better than sex" product. Sadly this is not the case and I will deter anyone and EVERYONE away from this regrettable purchase.
…read more

hrobertson825.title: not a fan
hrobertson825.description: This mascara is ok..just ok. It gets a little clumpy on my lashes and ends up looking too harsh.

crazy4color.title: MUST TRY, AMAZING!!!!!!!!!
crazy4color.description:
I love everything about this mascara. From the beautiful pink tube to the amazing results. As a Sephora employee I was able to preview this product months ago, and I have been eagerly waiting for this to launch in stores and on sephora.com. It gives incredible volume and definition without clumping. You can stop with a couple of coats or just keep going for an exaggerated look. I highly recommend and will continue to use everyday. Hope you love it like I do.
…read more

jasbee.title: Over-hyped product
jasbee.description:
I bought this mascara because of the buzz behind it... some from the reviews on here, some from beauty aficionados such as myself. I caved and finally got it, but I was disappointed. It is a mediocre mascara, and definitely over-hyped. My lashes have a decent amount of volume, are long, black, and straight naturally. This mascara definitely makes my lashes look more volumized, but it didn't lengthen them and did not hold any curl. By the end of the day, my lashes straightened out and it flaked ALL day. I really tried to give this mascara multiple chances, but no luck. This mascara may work for others, but considering what I look for in a mascara, it didn't do the job for me.
…read more

tifftreads.title: Pure Ecstasy
tifftreads.description: This mascara took my lashes from invisible and non-existent to extraordinary! I have attached pictures for proof! One coat was nice and charming and two coats were so AMAZING that I sent pics to my friends lol.

IAMiniquity.title: One Month
IAMiniquity.description:
Because I wanted to give it a fair review I used this product for a month before this. I was skeptical at first because of all the mixed reviews I'd read, it seemed like Better Than Sex Mascara (Eye-roll at the marketing) was a love it or hate it product. I ended up buying it on a whim. The first use I HATED, it caked on and gave me the length I wanted but it was spidery. After that use I scraped the excess product off before applying and it went on well. If I wore it for less than 4-5 hours it looked fantastic! After that, though, I had flakes everywhere. It also transferred, and on days where sweat or humidity was a factor it would get sticky (like it hadn't dried) and I'd notice it in my under eye. I think, for me, there are better products available.
…read more

Rahbin33.title: Wanted to love it
Rahbin33.description: I really wanted to love this mascara because your lashes look amazing after application. Unfortunately though this mascara flakes off badly. Throughout the day I notice tons of black dots all over the under eye area. Lately, I've been putting a drugstore mascara on top of the final product to cut down on the flaking, and it helps a little but really makes the hefty price tag justifiable.

Loves3.title: Definitely NOT better than $ex.
Loves3.description:
This was hyped up so much it's ridiculous. I received this as a deluxe sample and this is clumpy and just doesn't work right for my type of lashes. I have already long thick lashes-not sure if that makes a difference? It clumped up my lashes and made them look weird. If I wanted to make this look good I had to work at it and separate each lash myself and that defeats the purpose of a mascara. This was not it was all cracked up to be. It's NOT better than drugstore mascaras, and that's the truth.
…read more

dalliance.title: I purchased this mascara on a whim - I was looking for a volumizing and lengthening mascara that wasn't too wet. I have thin lashes that are decently long but aren't very thick at all. This mascara was perfect for what I needed! When I first pulled the wand out of the tube I thought to myself, "wow this looks very thick", but I found the formula very lightweight and applied very evenly on my lashes. Creates MAJOR volume and a decent amount of length. I love the shape of the brush, it grabs my lashes in all spots, however it's really easy to make a mess of the lower lash line because it's so big. This is a very expensive mascara as far as mascara goes, however I like that it's paraben free and is more or less one of the better well rounded mascara's that I've tried! Pro's: tons of volume, perfect formula that isn't too dry or too wet. Con's: price is a little steep, brush is hard to manoeuvre around the lower lashes, not as lengthening as it could be.

knittinmama.title: Really love this mascara!
knittinmama.description:
I have always loved dark, thick, long lashes. As I have gotten older, it has been harder to find mascaras that will do the job for my thinning, shorter, aging eyelashes. I have also lost some lashes from health issues. I tried Too Faced Better Than S** Mascara, despite the name, which frankly would have been a turn-off for me normally, because I got a free sample of it. (Funny, the review would not let me post the actual name of the mascara!) I am so glad I tried it! It is wonderful and gives me exactly the kind of eyelashes that I have always liked, full, long, thick, curled and very black. I even tested the staying power by wearing it overnight, and even then it did not smudge or flake off!! I have tried TONS of mascaras, and this is absolutely one of the top 2 for me, and I will definitely be getting more. The brush is fantastic. If you want beautiful big lashes, you should definitely try this. I heartily recommend it, especially for those of us who are older and having problems with our lashes disappearing!
…read more

amn33.title: Bummer
amn33.description: I was really looking forward to getting this mascara, but it ended up not being worth the $23 dollars. It looks good on, but is super clumpy when you apply it. Really wish it would have worked out.

Nikkikopz.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
Nikkikopz.description: This mascara does make your lashes look fuller and longer but the product does not last long. It is flakey and clumpy. It caused me to have major dark eyes after it flakes off during the day. This product was not good for my sensitive eyes and for the price I think it's a rip off.

kaaramel.title: Mini size is different
kaaramel.description: So I had used 2 of the mini bottles of this mascara and absolutely loved them, but whrn I finally bought the full-size, I was shocked by how clumpy it was! Compared the full size wand to the mini wand, and the mini has Way more bristles much closer together, so no clumps with the mini! Was disappointed by that, and will only be getting the minis of this mascara from now on-the full size is terribly clumpy.

hsm87.title:
I gave into the hype and got this mascara, but it didn't do much for my very short lashes. I got decent length and not much volume. It worked just as good as my drugstore mascara.
I think this is good for those with already medium length and long lasheslashes, otherwise it's not impressive on very short lashes.

Juni6.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

MeganMarek.title: THE best mascara
MeganMarek.description:
I generally don't have too many problems with mascara, but after using my sample of this stuff, apparently I was wrong. My lashes are very long and natural looking. I did use two coats but even after one it separated my lashes and did not clump a bit. With other mascaras, I feel like I used so much but with this, my lashes are not caked with product. When my sample runs out I will definitely purchase the full size.
…read more

shellp27.title: Marketing Ploy
shellp27.description:
The advertising on the packaging is a bit more than far fetched. Here is my take away from this product: - Does a nice job of volumizing - Doesn't lengthen any more than other mascara's i've used, including drug store brands. - FLAKY - just a few hours after applying this was flaking on my face. For this factor alone, I would not purchase again. Flaking leads to smudging etc. - Not too difficult to remove which is nice compared to some other leading brands.
…read more

GeorgiaPeach7.title: Very Disappointing
GeorgiaPeach7.description: I was extremely disappointed with this mascara. For the price I paid I really thought it would be incredible. It does deliver great volume BUT it smears after a few hours of wearing. Also, even after washing my face I find mascara under my eyes for days.

315gal.title: Not better than sex for me
315gal.description: I finally caved trying this after reading so many great reviews. Unfortunately, for me, it was not meant to be. Despite the brush being great, I had a hard time applying this without getting too clumpy. I didn't find the result to be as volumizing as advertised and it smudged after only a few hours on me. Sigh. Conclusion: this mascara is not so sexy.

autumnqueen1.title: Not worth the price tag...
autumnqueen1.description: I bought this after reading such great reviews, but ended up being disappointed. I've had drugstore mascaras that work better than this one. Super flaky, made my lashes look clumpy, and I actually stopped putting it on my lower lashes because it would smear so badly throughout the day. I used this up, but will never repurchase.

Cheldubb.title: Amazing!
Cheldubb.description: I purchased this item two weeks ago, and have been in complete love since! Highly recommended for anyone looking for long, lush, volumized lashes!

lilybell33.title: meh
lilybell33.description: I like the way it looks when first applied but after a couple hours it fades and almost melts under my eye making it appear like I have bags under my eyes

superkid268.title: Lashes Look Fab!
superkid268.description:
I always thought that one mascara would be enough. Pick a favorite and stay with it. But, Too Faced's "Better Than S*x" made me realize there was room in my makeup bag for two awesome mascaras. This is my second favorite mascara after "They're Real" from Benefit. It gives lashes a TON of volume, and the brush shape is great for the upper lids. However, for the lower lids, the application can be a bit much and tends to get messy, so I've learned to use sparingly and carefully. Benefit's "They're Real" gives lashes more length, and the little ball at the end of the wand is helpful in creating more definition, including the bottom area. But! Too Faced "Better Than S*x" mascara has a couple of advantages over Benefit, in my opinion. 1) The brush is super soft and conforms beautifully to the top lashes 2) the volume and color tends to look darker. I am still using my sample size, but plan to splurge on the full-size when I run out. *Also, I think the Sephora auto-review thinks "s*x" is a dirty word and claims my review contains profanity. Haha.
…read more

junglebeauty.title: Holy Grail!
junglebeauty.description: I have found my holy grail mascara! Looks like falsies, no clumps, no smudging, not too hard to remove, not too time consuming to put on... Absolute perfection!

olderbeauty.title: Volume and more volume
olderbeauty.description: Very good at adding volume, dark black, okay on length. Also use "yes their real" from benefits which does better at length and defining. Great for quick morning one coat and done. When dressing up use this and then "yes their real" for perfect combo of length and volume. No problem with flaking and comes off with soap and water.

sophiagrace.title: One of the best high-end mascaras I've tried. It's a dry formula which I love. The brush is a perfect shape, no mascara goop on the end when you pull it out of the cylinder. This mascara leaves my lashes separated, voluminous & longer, and soft to the touch. I have a trial size of this that I'm using, but I'd buy the full size when I run out.

amazingracie91.title: love it!
amazingracie91.description: I absolutely love this mascara. It adds volume and length to my lashes. I hardly need an eyelash curler with this mascara. I would recommend if you have straight, short eyelashes like me

stephaniekate.title: SO GOOD!
stephaniekate.description: The brush looks like a scary, clumpy disaster, but it's quite the opposite! I'm Asian and my lashes are very sparse and this mascara makes them lengthy, BLACK, and thick. Plus it does not flake off!

shrucker.title: I do not understand the hype.
shrucker.description: This mascara has got to be one of the most overrated products I've tried. It looks okay upon application, but within hours, the product was flaking off into my eyes. Absolutely horrible.

mkaykobba.title: Lumpy
mkaykobba.description:
I LOVE the brush and packaging, but as someone else stated, the formula is awful. It is so thick and messy. I also had problems with it transferring to the skin under my lower lashes throughout the day. Which is weird because when I applied this to my lower lashes it was fine in the morning hours, but by the afternoon the product had transferred onto my skin. Makes no sense. It never fails, it happens to me every time no matter what. I don't understand the hype.
…read more

finchieface.title: Genuinely the best mascara I have ever tried!
finchieface.description:
As a major mascara lover, when I heard about this I instantly had to try it! I have used most of the big name mascara brands (They're Real, Hypnose etc) and was intrigued not only by the name but also by all the hype surrounding this. I wasn't expecting it to be as good as my favourite all time mascara, the Extreme Party Mascara from Bobbi Brown, but it runs circles around anything I have ever tried. With one sweep, such dramatic volume!
…read more

aleexandraaa.title: Ehh
aleexandraaa.description: I don't understand the hype about this mascara. I think the brush is great but I don't like the formula. This mascara flakes onto my face after it's on for a few hours. It makes my lashes look good right when I put it on but I can't get passed it flaking onto my face. ):

cupcakelicious.title: full and long lashes
cupcakelicious.description: I love to try new mascaras and when I got a sample of this one it has been one of my top 3 mascara's so far. The brush is amazing, it gives you full,thick lashes. Helps define your lashes and is very black which is a priority for me. Only down fall is the cost of $30 when mascara last less time then anything else in your makeup box

madaraismine.title: LOL
madaraismine.description: It's hilarious how overhyped and underwhelming this product is. I don't think it defines worth a darn,it lengthens kind of,but it's more effort than I can bare trying to get fierce lashes. It's pretty average,I wouldn't recommend.

AlwaysHiccups.title: IDK who you're sleeping with, but this is terrible
AlwaysHiccups.description: It goes on well and looks good on my lashes, but it falls off within hours, leaving black specs/smears under my eyes. I would NOT buy this product ever again, let alone call it better than sex. I was very disappointed with this product.

am05.title: Volume and lengthening
am05.description: To be honest, this mascara is actually really good. I don't know why so many people are hating on it. Personally, it works fine for me. My lashes are not too short but also not too long, and with this mascara it gives it such great volume and length, it's incredible! The only thing I'd have to say is that after I guess 5 hours or so, it'll start to smudge. It doesn't clump if you apply it the right way.

juliatilly.title: Made my lashes look really pretty but I was disappointed in how it didn't stay on my lashes and I ended up having dark shadows under my eyes from the mascara.

Maricheeky.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

nzgirl93.title: I hate everything about this mascara. It's super clumpy and smudges and flakes everywhere. Don't waste your money

CountBabulon.title: Holy Grail Product
CountBabulon.description: Don't listen to the reviews about clumping, I promise you it is user error. Wipe the wand before applying and don't go hog wild with the mascara and you are sure to achieve the greatest lashes of your life. I like this mascara 100x more then "They're Real", Dior Extase, Roller Lash, and the kat von d mascara. This mascara is perfection if you know how to apply mascara!

mere85.title: the best mascara!
mere85.description: This mascara is amazing! I have tried a lot of other expensive mascaras, and this is by far my favorite! It makes my lashes so long and thick, I never leave home without at least one coat!

AronCassy.title: flakes badly
AronCassy.description: I LOVE how well this stuff instantly boosts length and volume of my lashes. But holy crud does it flake!! I tossed mine out because it just ended up as a million little freckles on my under eye area. So disappointing.

StaceBabe.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

lorybear.title: I'll never use another...
lorybear.description:
Look, everyone is complaining about clumpiness and flakiness...and yes that does sometimes happen with this mascara...BUT...you will not find a mascara that gives you more length and volume to your lashes. I've tried drugstore and Sephora ones and this mascara turns my tint eyelashes into almost glue on fake eyelashes. To avoid a lot of clumping with this thick formula and super big brush, try wiping the excess mascara on the wand on the mouth of the container before applying. (you're really only gonna get clumps if you just pull it out and slap it on. The style of the mascara wand makes it have too much on it when you pull it out) I put 2-3 coats carefully and pluck the clumps off and I'm good to go.
…read more

HannahTherese.title: My Holy Grail Mascara...with some caveats
HannahTherese.description:
First off, I LOVE this mascara. It delivers more volume in fewer coats than any mascara I've ever tried, and I've tried a lot of mascaras. In my experience, nothing comes close. And for this reason, I repurchase again and again. However, it's not for everyone. There are a few issues you may encounter: 1) It's MESSY until dry and will end up all over your hands, face, and makeup bag if you aren't careful. 2) It's not good for lower lashes. When I wore it on my lower lashes it gave me raccoon eyes, and the large brush makes it less than ideal for lower lash application. 3) It can clump. It is possible to keep it from clumping, but you have to wipe the excess off as you pull it out of the tube (which you should be doing with most mascaras anyway), and using a lash comb or separating mascara afterwards really helps. Bottom line, I gave it 5 stars because I'm hooked on the unparalleled volume. But if you like super defined, clump-free lashes, want a mascara that won't budge under any conditions, or like to apply your mascara in a hurry, this isn't it.
…read more

lilyar.title: Ugly Mascara
lilyar.description: Too clumpy, flakey and weights down my eyelashes.

Cheyenne28.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
Cheyenne28.description:
I wish I could give 0 stars, this mascara is literally the worst one I have ever used. Don't let all of these reviews fool you. This product is so incredibly overrated. This mascara looks so amazing when you first put it on, it gives great volume, but after it dries it immediately starts flaking off everywhere! By the end of the day my lashes look short and stubby and I have flakes all over my face. I have drugstore mascaras that are a million times better than this. Please do yourself a favor and stay far away from this mascara people! I will never purchase this again.
…read more

BellaaBaaby.title: FLAKES FLAKES FLAKES!
BellaaBaaby.description: Very cute packaging but believe me It flakes ! After an hour it was all over my face :(

ariel12.title: Doesn't last

I wanted to love this so badly. It went on beautifully. I love the shape of the brush and it gave great length and volume, creating noticeable lashes that weren't clumpy or gross. However, after 4-5 hours it began to flake, causing major eye irritation, and left smudges under my eyes by the end of the day. Yet what remained on my lashes was oddly hard to remove... If you have problems with the staying power of mascaras or sensitive eyes I would skip this one.

MsJustice.title: Jaw-Dropping
MsJustice.description:
I haven't reviewed anything yet, but this product was so unbelievable that I felt the need to share, especially since I tend to rely on reviews! I ordered this mascara because of the amazing reviews and was completely blown away upon my first application... My jaw literally dropped as I was applying the mascara! I've never seen my eyelashes look so long, full, and amazing. I have deep set eyes and was worried about the large brush, but I didn't have any issues at all. Further, I have tried several higher-end mascaras (inc. DiorShow) and my eyelashes have ended up either looking spider-like or uneven and clumpy, despite applying the product with the patience and technique required. This mascara (I tried to use its name, but the review police detected "profanity" - lol!!) did not clump or flake, and the application was smooth, and totally buildable, i.e. it didn't dry up after the first coat and chunk up or flake on the second. My eyelashes looked natural - or as natural as jaw-droppingly dramatic eyelashes can look - in the sense that each lash was coated and curled to perfection, and they fanned out beautifully, even after three coats (too much drama for day but suitable for night). Truly blown away by this mascara!
…read more

kelschuey.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL
kelschuey.description: Doesn’t stay. It looks fantastic going on, but was all over under my eyes by early afternoon. I work a desk job and rarely have mascaras run.

laurendarling.title: Flakes so bad!

makeupfeinjay22.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

coffeelipstick.title: awful
coffeelipstick.description:

stacybaltimore.title: Meh

By the end of the day I have black specks under my eyes every time I have worn it. I would not purchase this again.

mariloveshair.title: No Bueno!
mariloveshair.description: I dont know what all the hipe is about ,this is one of the worst mascaras i have ever used . Its flakky , weights my eyelashes down and gives me raccon eyes .

sakuraroseh.title: Great for length but very flakey
sakuraroseh.description: This mascara is very good for adding length to your lashes; however, it flakes a lot and ends up all over under my eyes.

beachbirdie80.title: BEST MASCARA EVER!
beachbirdie80.description: Let's me start by disclosing I'm a mascara lover! Mascara is serious business.... This is the best mascara I've ever used hands down! Provides length and builds up easily to beef up your lashes! Holy grail status!

Mirosela.title: Gives a lot of volume but smudges easily.
Mirosela.description: I adore how much volume it gave my lashes, but if you put too much by one coat your will get spider lashes. After half an hour on putting on the product I already see black smudges under my eyes; and I live in a dry climate.

rafaelladaisy.title: Too flakey

It flakes down to my cheeks a lot and when I try to brush it off it leaves a black mark. Definitely not worth the hype, it is lengthening and thickening on the lash but so many other mascaras are. It's also very clumpy. Nothing special.

grenadene.title: meh
grenadene.description: I tried to like this. The formula is ok but not amazing. The wand is impossible to get my itty bitty lashes it's just too bulky. This is pretty much for people who have long enough lashes not to need mascara :( bummer

aliya802.title: awesome
aliya802.description: I LOVE THIS MASCARA! It made my eyelashes so full and beautiful but it wasn't very clumpy. If you're someone like me who really likes the full Volume look then I diffidently recommend this. The only problem that I have with it is that the brush is a little too big for me but no major problems.

kirstenmichelle.title: flakes
kirstenmichelle.description: I was so excited to try this mascara because everyone seems to love it. I like the why it looks on my lashes, but it flakes really bad on me.

isabeldavis2324.title: This product is just way too clumpy and flakes off when you have worn it for a couple of hours

Rachel281.title: wanted to love it
Rachel281.description:
I have wanted to try this mascara for years! I got a small tube in Sephora's Lash Stash kit. My lashes are medium length and straight. This mascara made them look awesome! However, a few hours later I had flakes all over my face and black smudges under my eyes that I had to wipe off. By the end of the work day, it didn't even look like I had mascara on. I am disappointed with the staying power of this mascara, especially since it looked great.
…read more

GGxo.title: Amazing!
GGxo.description:
This is my fourth time purchasing this mascara. I usually wore Chanel Inimitable, but I felt like it didn't last me very long. A SA recommended this to me, and I fell in love. I have naturally long lashes, so I look for something with great volume. This does it all-- lengthens, volumizes and curls. My lashes literally touch my eyebrows. It's a deep black color and it goes on like laquer, it is kind of shiny. I get complimented all the time on my lashes and asked many times if these are my real lashes. I have tried many many mascaras- Lancôme hypnose, benefit they're real, and DiorShow to name a few. This one blows them all out of the water. This mascara also doesn't clump- it actually separates my lashes and fans them out- one of my favorite things about it. The rose gold packaging is beautiful. The only thing I would complain about is that the top of the tube can get messy because it's a rather thick consistency, but then again that could just be me. I love this and I think everyone should give it a try!!
…read more

MrsJustine.title: Wonderful, but only for about 2 hours...
MrsJustine.description: This mascara goes on beautifully and makes my lashes noticibly fuller and longer. Huge downside though is that it smudges really bad after about 2 hours. Leaves me with raccoon eyes. :(

cambree.title: Great product
cambree.description: A really great product for curling and defining lashes. Below I have photos of my eyes, one with one coat of the mascara, one without any mascara. No retouching done. The product does tend to clump slightly with additional coats, but overall there is a great intense color and great definition.

Aisha09.title: waste of money
Aisha09.description:
I really wanted to love this mascara. I bought it after reading good reviews and the travel size was a hit. The first time I tried it on, it was great. Lashes looked good and surprisingly I was getting compliments (never thought anyone would notices my lashes). Second time, the brush came out wet and spilled the product everywhere. Even when I tried to close the tube, the product just...squeezed out. This doesn't happen with the travel size but $12 is too much for a travel sized mascara.
…read more

tracygirl64.title: I'm returning it!
tracygirl64.description:
I decided to try this mascara and expected it to be so great after reading all of the reviews. I'm sorry, but my current mascara is WAY better than this one! I have a lot of eyelashes that are fine and bone straight, so I have to use a curler and I always look for a mascara that can provide good volume to my lashes. This mascara weighed my lashes down, it did not hold a curl at all like it says it will. It's also very clumpy and hard to remove when you want to take it off. The brush is big, so it's hard to get your inner lashes too. The only thing this mascara did do is provide good volume to my lashes and I like that it is formulated without parabens. Other than that, I'm sorry, but I do not recommend this mascara...I'm actually surprised by all of the great reviews.
…read more

asaps.title: Melts
asaps.description: I loved this product, it added so much lengths and I've gotten a lot of compliments. Except I have to wear it with the bare minerals locked and coated top coat mascara, Otherwise it would melt down really fast

summybear.title: MAJOR FALL OUT!!
summybear.description:
So I LOVE the way this looks at first, lots of volume and super dark, but let's say 3 hours in, things go tragic. Major falling and flaking. I absolutely CANNOT put it on my lower lashes because I will look like a raccoon. And the upper lashes are basically bare if I slightly touch them. I've bought the water proof, and I've had better experiences with it, but I'm going back to my good ole Dior show.

jwest449.title: terrible

It didn't seem to add any length what so ever and about an hour later it started to flake off. I generally like most too faced products but I absolutely hated this one.

sheerbeauty.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

iluvtrees9.title: Thick, full lashes
iluvtrees9.description: Curls them and i love how it lets me attain that thick, TWIGGY look but still separates them!

angelori56.title: Best Ever!!!
angelori56.description: For all the Many mascaras that I have tried, used, liked, hate or reacted to, I say, good bye to you!!! I Love this Too Faced Mascara. It does exactly what I need it to & looks amazing. I have light, thin, short lashes & this stuff maximizes them to their fullest without looking cheap or clumpy. It is the best.

asian1026.title: One of the more underrated mascara
asian1026.description:
A Holy Grail Product. I consider this mascara way better than the They're Real mascara from Benefit. Both formulas are very silky and strong that allows your lashes to be coated with the utmost length and volume. However, this mascara brush has softer bristles that allow for more volume in just one coat. This formula coupled with this brush gives you lashes like never before. Lashes coated to length and volume that brightens and opens your eyes; it also gives the illusion of fake lashes! All in all, a product all must try.
…read more

kuljitxo.title: Love and Hate
kuljitxo.description:
I have heard so many great reviews about this mascara so I decided to give it a go myself. This mascara really volumizes my lashes and makes them thick and long which I love but when I apply it, the mascara looks very clumpy. This problem seems to go away as I go through my day but I wish it wasn't there in the first place. I would recommend this mascara to people who want to make their lashes look very long and thick
…read more

KarolinaWhaley.title: Flakes off
KarolinaWhaley.description:
The application is wet but it makes your lashes very thick and dark. However I do have a couple complaints. 1. The brush is clumpy looking and has a lot of product on it so my lashes do clump up. 2. It flakes off. BAD! When I get home after school I can clearly see the flakes under my lower lash line and on my cheeks If you have time to clean these throughout the day then this is a great mascara but if not then i wouldn't recommend

rb97.title: i tried

asali.title: no it's not better than...
asali.description: Raccoon eyes after 2-3 hrs. No thank u.

firepail.title: I wish I could give this negative stars! terrible!
firepail.description:
at first it seems like this mascara really delivers, volume, length, easy to use--VAVOOM lashes. but then, nearly immediately, the black starts to travel into dark rings under the eye. NOT CUTE. on the dryest of dry days, it runs under the eyes and I don't have oily skin or problems with excessive sweating or squirt gun myself in the face randomly. GOD HELP YOU if you wear this and it gets humid, or there's a raindrop, or your hot coffee is steamy while you drink it because this will be everywhere in the least cute of ways. I HATE IT and wouldn't gift it to my worst enemy.
…read more

ohokaymaya.title: not impressed
ohokaymaya.description: I thought this was going to be my holy grail mascara but it was just a big disappointment. My lashes look clumpy and it starts flaking off after a few hours. I always get those dreaded black smudges around the eyes too when I use this which is unacceptable in my book for $20 mascara.

VavaMarie.title: LOVE IT!
VavaMarie.description:
First of all I am an eyeliner and mascara freak, obsessed with both. I got this mascara as a 100 point perk, I was unsure about it at first until I took the time to apply it properly. And....IN LOVE! It makes my lashes look plush, long, and very black with a soft look. I see people complaining that it flakes after so many hours etc...no makeup is forever perfect or has 100% staying power no matter what the description claims. Yes it flakes a little by the end of the day, but it's nothing a little touch up can't fix. I would rather have soft long looking lashes then crispy gel looking lashes like most mascaras I have tried.
…read more

nycgirlinok.title: mascara disappointment
nycgirlinok.description: I was very disappointed in the product. It flakes and smears badly, but it does lengthen great. I would not buy this product again.

kimmyfaye.title: Great mascara
kimmyfaye.description:
After reading mixed reviews about this product I was happy to be able to purchase a mini one with my points. I was concerned when I read about it flaking. Well, I'm not sure about others, but I took this product to Mexico in 75% humidity and there was no flaking or smearing. It really darkens and lengthens my lashes. I'm highly impressed with the volume and product itself. I will continue to use this mascara.

SpookySpooks.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

melinda123.title: ok
melinda123.description: Love how it makes my lashes look but flakes a lot and for some reason I'm always getting this on my upper eyelid :/

AAMCWING.title: Love this!!!
AAMCWING.description: Tried the travel size to see if I would like it! Love it! I was using 2 different drugstore brands to achieve the effect I wanted. This one covers it!!!

besteyeshadow.title: Best Mascara Ever
besteyeshadow.description: This is the best mascara I have ever used. You can do both eyes - upper and lower with one time out of the bottle.

xoltaylor.title: Smudges like crazy!
xoltaylor.description: Not only is this quiet clumpy if you're not careful during application, but also tends to flake off. This smudged to my lower lash line after a mere hour.

curlyyvo216.title: Fluffy lashes, easy to remove
curlyyvo216.description:
I've had a great experience with the product. I read the reviews after the purchase and was worried. I would describe my routine as a tinted moisturizer, mascara and lip gloss regime. I applied to clean lashes without curling, 1-2 coats at most and I saw instant curl and lengthening. I didn't want to keep applying coats in case that would cause any clumping as I've experienced with other mascaras. Very easy to apply and easy to remove. I use drug store acne wash. I didn't have to reapply constantly. I didn't do any "building up". It provided the most natural fluffy look. I applied on the corners at most on my bottom lashes but was light handed. I experienced no clumps, smudging or raccoon eyes. I would purchase again.
…read more

Manigs.title: Overrated
Manigs.description: Very clumpy, I had to clean off the brush before every use which is a huge waste of product. Also, I HATE the shape of the brush, it's practically useless. Don't understand all the hype of this mascara, it doesn't even last a long time.

DamnitsDina.title: Longest, thickest lashes ever.
DamnitsDina.description: I love the dramatic effect of long, thick, volumized, and defined lashes. This makes my nonexistent short lashes pop up to my eyebrows if I really want to with just a COUPLE of coats. Usually, I use a mascara primer but with this product, I don't even need one to make it seem as if I have false lashes on.

audeygirl.title: terrible stuff
audeygirl.description: this mascara is awful. my friend and I both bought it on the recommendation of a Sephora expert. It clumps too thick to apply...we both hate it.

MaddieMMM.title: Too Bad
MaddieMMM.description:
I wanted to love this mascara. I really did. The packaging is stunning, Too Faced is a great brand, and the name makes me giggle and blush. However, I was very disappointed with this product, especially for the price. The first few applications were lovely, but after maybe a week it was insanely clumpy and messy. And it flaked, which is my mortal enemy. I definitely won't be buying this again, which is a shame because it really is such a delightful package, and it's fun to say "Better Than S*x" when people ask you what mascara you use.
…read more

mendela.title: flakes
mendela.description: At first when you apply it looks beautiful but then about two hours later it flakes everywhere by the end of the day it looks like you were never wearing mascara. I would not recommend it

CMakeupNewbie12.title: Best. Mascara. Ever.
CMakeupNewbie12.description: It was love at first glide. This was one of those products that after one use, I wondered where it had been all my life. Why had no one told me before that this product existed?! Normally not one to splurge on makeup, this mascara is worth every penny. I will never go back to drugstore brand products; converted for life.

connie123w.title: Happy that I tried this one.
connie123w.description:
I finally got this mascara in a kit and I'm so glad I did. The first time I put it on I was amazed. Ive tried a fair amount of high end mascaras this is not like them. With one coat my lashes look so much fuller yet very natural. It doesn't look like Ive put on a ton of mascara to make my lashes thicker it looks like I have naturally full lashes. My lashes are flexible and soft all day but it dose wear off a little by the end of the day. Now I do have problems with it smudging but every single mascara dose it on me anyways (haven't tried any waterproof ones so can't say about those). I thought I would keep trying until I find one that works. With all the mascaras I've tried before I just didn't like them to the point where I just want to make them work until I tried BTS. So I did my research. Girls, if you have problems with mascaras smudging, put your eye primer on where it smudges and set your eye area with powder before your mascara routine. It gets sooo much better. Don't put too many coats on or comb your lashes after your mascara sets and you won't get flakes. This is the first time Im so happy with a mascara. Hope my experience would be a little helpful. Plus isn't the packaging the cutest?
…read more

morgroy18.title: Made my eyelashes look super long and nice but its very clumpy and heavy

2rubblemaker.title: Disappointed
2rubblemaker.description: I had heard so many good things about this mascara so I decided to try it and am very disappointed. It doesn't add volume or length but goes on very clumpy and then flakes off onto eyelids and under eyes. Definitely try it before you buy it!

earmstrong.title: Disappointing
earmstrong.description: It's so disappointing because I love the results. It gives a nice, full look to my lashes, but there is one huge downfall. It flakes off SEVERELY. There will always be flaky black smudges under the eyes after a little while :( I had to return it. So sad because I have such high expectations of Too Faced!

beckalynn.title: Good & Bad
beckalynn.description:
Lets start with the good things first. This mascara is super voluminous and holds a curl all day. It thickens the lashes and can look a bit spidery for someone who is used to defining mascaras, but I liked the look. The mascara is quite a wet formula. When I applied it, because the wand is so big, I tend to have to go back in to clean up once it dries down because it goes everywhere. The biggest problem for me though, is it transfers on me within a couple of hours. I have black on my bottom lash line or a raccoon type smudge. I tried it out a few times to make sure, but it just keeps happening. It makes my lashes look good but it's too messy for me. I know of people who find this a holy grail item, but also they tend to wear shadow without a primer, which I can't do, so maybe my lids are just too oily for this product.
…read more

lauramaye.title: Nice mascara
lauramaye.description:
I'll admit, I mainly bought this because of the super sleek, but girly pink tube packaging. It has nice weight to it too, to make it feel even more luxurious. Now, onto the actual product. It is pretty volumizing, one of the best I've found. To me, it's a dryer formula, and builds fairly nicely. It can look clumpy if you don't take your time and wiggle the mascara through your lashes. It doesn't give a lot of length, but I don't think it's suppose to. It is super black, which I love. The brush is nice, but I find it hard to get my short inner corner lashes since the brush is hourglass shaped, so it's thick in the tip. I do get smudging sometimes, but my skin is super oily. Overall, I do like and would probably repurchase.
…read more

clubber1830264.title: Works great until half way through the day you realize you look like a freaking raccoon!

isaisa125.title: best mascara!
isaisa125.description: I am a mascara junkie, and I must say.... it's the best one yet. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for full beautiful thick lashes.

Jazzy2424.title: Disappointed
Jazzy2424.description: I couldn't wait to try this product to be let down. Everyone was raving about this mascara on You tube so I thought let me give it a try. It does give you volume, however, it was flaking throughout the day. It was also clumpy and just hated that I had flakes on my cheeks. Annoying!!!

MakeupCunt.title: HOLY GRAIL
MakeupCunt.description: this is literally the only mascara i use. IM NOT KIDDING. makes my lashes so long and black. the only downside is it can get clumpy if your not careful. so make sure you wipe some of the mascara off the wand before you apply and you should be good. other than that perfff

couponmommy.title: gloppy mess!
couponmommy.description:
I cannot tell you whether or not the actual mascara is a good product as it comes out in the hugest, gloppy mess! The brush is massive, it is completely covered in product when you pull it out, and I end up getting it everywhere. For $23, I am not going to wipe the extra product off with a tissue--what a waste! Maybe some people can manage the brush, but I, for one, do not have the time nor energy. This is definitely going back.
…read more

jc4gotpaid.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

BreannaMM.title: Adds a lot of volume to my lashes but really weighs them down and they fall pretty flat quickly. Also flakes more than other high end mascara's, not my favourite but not horrible either.

betina00.title: PERFECT!
betina00.description: I can't believe I waited so long to try this! It really is amazing! I agree with other reviews; when you first begin to use the mascara too much product is on the brush. Just scrape off the excess and you are good to go. :)

Nightynight.title: Perfect Mascara!
Nightynight.description: I cannot gush about this mascara enough. I've been using it for awhile now and I'll continue to purchase as long as it is available. It really makes my lashes pop and doesn't run in the Vegas heat, seriously a savior during summer whether you wear the mascara alone or over/under falsies. Definitely recommend giving this a try!

BarefootGypsy5.title: flakes
BarefootGypsy5.description:
I have never returned any product I have purchased at Sephora, but there is a first time for everything. I initially loved the effect of this mascara, lots of volume and great length...only within hours the volume and length has diminished and you have flakes under your eyes. I initially thought maybe it was due to weather or rubbing my eye so I gave it more time. After almost a week of use, I get the same results, great lashes for awhile then black flakes under my eyes. I even tried using a different mascara on my lower lashes which did not help. I still had flakes making my makeup look messy and like I have dark circles. Very disappointing.
…read more

annikaaa.title: Overrated
annikaaa.description: This product is good at lengthening the lashes but that's about it. It clumps easily & flakes off throughout the day. I reach for my drugstore mascaras over this one haha

cmoon26.title: good but not my fave
cmoon26.description: I am a mascara junkie and have been wanting to try this forever. I wasn't blown away by it, but I do like how it makes my lashes look. Its very buildable too, with no clumping. My go-to is still RollerLash by Benefit.

ravennmua.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL
ravennmua.description:
I have been using this mascara for almost 2 years now. No other product works as well as this one, you truly get beautiful lashes when you use this properly. A little secret for getting the best out of this mascara - heat it up a little before applying (i.e., rub it between your hands for a few seconds). Personally, I have never experienced any flaking from this product, it stays on for hours and looks amazing the entire time. The flaking people talk about might just be a personal issue. Hands down, my favorite makeup product.
…read more

Katya1313.title: Wasn't impressed with it. Too clumpy. I like benefit "they are real" a lot better

muajunkie12.title: Great Mascara but buy the DUPE!
muajunkie12.description: This mascara is great! It is very voluminous, very black, and very lengthening. The only con is that this mascara dries out very fast! My best advice is to buy the Lash Paradise mascara by L'Oreal. It does just as great as the Better than Sex and is only $9 vs $23

lindaesq.title: smudgey and kinda clumpy
lindaesq.description: Not better than sex... this mascara is too heavy and it smudges under my eyes! The sephora employees made me believe that this would be it for me but I'm disappointed. It does provide volume but it makes it so that my lashes don't stay curled because the product is too heavy. Will not be purchasing again.

iluvmakeup420.title: Not A Fan
iluvmakeup420.description: I had high hopes for this mascara because I've heard a lot of good things but I'm way less than impressed. I'm a pro at mascara at this point so it's not me not applying it right, it goes on super clumpy and creates spider lashes instantly! I'm nervous to take it back just because I don't want the looks but I really would like to exchange it for another brand

Emilymags.title: Best mascara ever!!! Full volume, intense length and actually gave my straight Asian lashes a curl. It also did not smudge all over.

HelloLovely22.title: very thickening
HelloLovely22.description: I love this mascara when I want a dramatic look. I love how thickening it is and haven't found another mascara that makes my lashes as full, however I don't think it's as lengthening and without another mascara to comb it out it can be clumpy. I find I always use it in combination with another mascara.

jaclyn97.title: raccoon eyes
jaclyn97.description: I got a sample of this mascara, and with all of the great reviews I was super excited to try it. I wore it one night to try it out, as I was hoping to wear it to prom, and within a few hours, it had smudged everywhere and I had raccoon eyes. Needless to say, that's why you always try a product before wearing it somewhere important! I definitely won't be buying the full sized product.

nbi3.title: Dissappointed
nbi3.description:
I bought this mascara yesterday because I ran out of my Benefit They're Real mascara and wanted to try something new. I went through my whole makeup routine, which includes setting spray, which worked perfectly with my old mascara, but at the end of the day I found that the mascara had worn off and rubbed under my eyes, giving me dark eye circles. When I was applying it, I thought it was kind of clumpy and I needed to do a few more coats than usual to get the look I like. This definitely was not worth the hype, it is the quality of a drugstore mascara.
…read more

TaylorBerk.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

HKSmakeup.title: great but get the waterproof one
HKSmakeup.description:
This is such a great mascara because it makes your eyelashes look like fake eyelashes! It really increases volume, length and curl. The only issue is that this one flakes off throughout your day. I found that the $15 travel size one doesn't flake by the $30 full size does. Weird right? I recommend purchasing the waterproof one like I did because it doesn't flake. The only thing with that is that you have to take more time to take it off!
…read more

Goldenlotus1.title: Good Volume but Flawed
Goldenlotus1.description: Love the dark black pigment and the curling effect on my upper lashes from the wand shape. However, I get a lot of clumps I have to remove with an eyelash comb and it is definitely not smudge-proof! I rubbed my eye accidentally at work and looked like a raccoon afterward! O.o

JenJoy94.title: I was disappointed. Definitely not better than sex. The product crumbled off of my lashes. Wouldn't repurchase.

epolly.title: Could be great but flakes like crazy
epolly.description: My lashes are super long and thick with this mascara, I really love the way it looks but almost immediately it starts flaking which is a huge turn off for me. I haven't tried the waterproof but I shouldn't have to use waterproof to avoid flaking if it is better. For the price I expected more, tried it twice thinking maybe it was just the first tube but after the second was the same I'm moving away from it.

Jpalum.title: Wispy look
Jpalum.description:
I really like this mascara! I don't know how else to describe the lashes other than wispy defined, that mink eyelash look. I'm getting away from ridiculous looking spider leg lashes and this is the perfect way to do it because my eyes are still really defined my eyelashes are still thick looking, curled and not clumpy. Plus it's really build-able, one coat is perfect for the work place to have beautifully curled lashes that make you look awake and 2-3 coats is perfect for going out. My only annoyance is the brush handle is really heavy, not going to stop me but I'm afraid ill drop it on my carpet! oh and I noticed its only 0.27 oz which is slightly less than some mascaras which means its a little more expensive than you realize
…read more

JessNally.title: My favorite mascara.
JessNally.description: Although the brush isn't the best, the formula is perfect. It can easily be layered to create a 'bombshell' effect. I use several coats per application and my last tube lasted almost 6 months. I highly recommend.

FakeupBCMakeup.title: Not worth the hype..
FakeupBCMakeup.description: I was so excited to get this... It was sold out for weeks where I live and when I finally picked it up, I used it once and haven't touched it again. Thinking of returning it. It smeared all over under my eyes and when I tried to wipe it off, it just smeared even more! Maybe it's just me, but I don't plan on using it again. I want my money back!!

corgigrrl.title: AMAZING
corgigrrl.description: I've tried almost every mascara in the game, from drug store to dior and this mascara is still the best. My lashes come out thick, full, long and dark without being clumpy at all. The brush is unique and works like a dream. Highly recommended.

dorit87.title: A flaky mess!
dorit87.description:
I generally take the word of my favorite YouTube makeup vloggers, but I bought this mascara after thinking it over for a long time and I ended up giving it to a friend after using it twice. This mascara is AWFUL! It flakes so poorly, especially when trying to remove the mascara, and I always end up getting flakes in my eyes! It also transfers off my bottom lashes onto my skin, unlike my multitude other mascaras. Maybe I got a bad batch, or maybe it's just a terrible product.
…read more

catearl.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

Suzi30.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

Precious22.title: One of my favorites
Precious22.description: I love this mascara, but it flakes throughout the day. Kind of disappointing, but the effect is has on my lashes is beautiful.

HiItsMe.title: My Favorite
HiItsMe.description: It's the best mascara I've ever tried. It gives me so much volume, fullness, length. I pair it with Dior eyelash primer sometimes and the results are amazing ! I get so many compliments on my lashes!

catjunkie.title: I fell in love
catjunkie.description:
I have been a loyal, vocal fan of Benefit's They're Real mascara, and never imagined myself using another product. Then I found this mascara and had to try it. Oh my, this stuff is amazing. This is my new favorite daily mascara. One coat gives you rich, thick lashes for the daytime. If you want a sultry evening look, 2-3 coats of this stuff looks stunning and luscious. As long as you apply multiple coats before the previous coat dries, it's clump free, thick and dramatic. I love this mascara!
…read more

ajsv.title: Volume+length
ajsv.description: Love the mascara, gives the length and volume. However I wish tip of the brush was narrow cause it's difficult to get in corners :)

kissmeNmakeup.title: LOVE this but not the RUN
kissmeNmakeup.description: I fell in love with this mascara and have been using it for at least a year. I just don't like every time I look in a mirror (throughout the day) there is a black smudge under my eyes!! I wish I could find a mascara that gives me everything this one does, without the run ALL DAY!!! :(

joselynleeanne.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

teenreview.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

byme4u.title: A new kind of volume
byme4u.description: I have skimpy lashes. This mascara lays down volume like a fur coat! I've had volume, but nothing like the Too Faced BTS. Unfortunately, like some of the other excellent volumizing mascaras, this one irritates my eyes by the end of the day.

Klchart12.title: Better than sex
Klchart12.description: This is by far the greatest mascara I have used. Nothing compares to this mascara. Once I started using it, I instantly fell in love

ziomy.title: LOVE IT
ziomy.description:
First of all I am SHOCKED at the negative reviews. It appears like some people aren't applying this mascara on correctly. It is supposed to volumize: not curl. Use your eyelash curler if you want curls. Also, the brush is designed to make your lashes pretty much look like falsies. Like ANY mascara if you have too much product on your brush you will get clumping and possibly flaking. Check the brush. Also, apply it like you would your eyeshadow when you're blending. little by little and in back and forth motions. let dry completely THEN add a second layer if you want. but honestly I don't think you'll need to. this makes my eyelashes look flawless! everyone compliments them. I highly recommend this product
…read more

belleg.title: flakes and smears
belleg.description: I felt compelled to write a review on this mascara after all the raves I'd heard. Gives a full effect and dark lashes but doesn't lengthen lashes. It has smeared below my eyes within a couple of hours each time I've worn it, and flakes off and into eyes, whether I put on one or multiple layers. There are so many better ones in the same price range so don't waste your money on this one.

martinezroxy.title: Not
martinezroxy.description: It wasn't very good. I was very disappointed with this mascara,especially after the sales person gave it rave reviews. It was clumpy and it was completely gone by 5. I did return it and went back to my favorite.

scully58.title: Wonderful!
scully58.description:
As a lot of people have done before me, I have tried just about every brand of mascara there is. Never have found just the right one though. This on the other hand is awesome. I have never had a mascara perform like this one does. It is intensely dark, goes on with just a few swipes and gives me long lush lashes. It curls them, and the curl stays all day (I do not use an eyelash curler). It does not flake at all, no raccoon eyes, doesn't clump. I am ordering a bunch more before they sell out. Finally, at the age of 55 I have found the best mascara I have ever worn. Only one minor drawback: the handle is a little heavy, but you get used to it. My search is finally over.
…read more

sallysoo.title: THE BEST EVER
sallysoo.description:
This is bar none THEE BEST mascara ever!! Yes, I've tried them all. Lancome's, They're Real, tarte, DIor etc. etc. This makes lashes so long it's unbelievable. The second coat thicken and elongates and darkens. I only do 2 coats but three is suggested. Second coat when still wet of course. This mascara separates beautifully too. On extra coats wipe applicator on tube top so it doesn't clump. I don't need to because I'm an expert at putting on mascara but BELIEVE ME GIRLS, this it IT!
…read more

nagrom.title: Above the rest!
nagrom.description: I've tried many high end mascaras over the years. I like Dior Show, Buxom, and several Smash-box kinds. But, none compare to this amazing one from Too Faced. Nothing has given me the volume, length, and overall fullness that it provides. The best part is that my lashes feel soft after I've applied it, which doesn't usually happen. Try it...it is well worth it!

Mimmb.title: Seriously impressed
Mimmb.description: This is one of the best I've tried (and I tried a lot). It gives very black, very big, very fabulous lashes. Very sexy. This is my new favorite.

dinolove.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL
dinolove.description: Terrible and overhyped. The brush is thick and applies so messy. Lashes looked clumpy.

crazyworkinmom.title: Wanted to love it but smeared on me
crazyworkinmom.description: I wanted to love this mascara. The brush was fabulous, it went on really well for me. Unfortunately, it smeared after a few hours. I have this trouble with many mascaras so don't assume it will happen to you. It thickened and lengthened without clumps for me. And, the pink package is a bonus for finding it in a large make up bag.

bubblekush12.title: It's okay.. not the best.
bubblekush12.description: It definitely lengthens, but when you apply it, chunks of the mascara goes onto your lashes & it's a mess! Do not recommend it if you want your lashes to be separated!

cliniquelvr.title: Looks great but smudges!
cliniquelvr.description: This mascara looks great when you first apply it. It's volumizing, lengthening, and doesn't ever get clumpy. HOWEVER, after 2 hours or so it definitely smudges. I don't ever get smudging from mascara so I was surprised to see this happening with such an expensive product. I will not be repurchasing.

MarshaJS.title: disappointed
MarshaJS.description: It goes on a bit clumpy but does actually really make eyelashes thick and lush. Unfortunately, by the end of the day, it had flaked all around my eyes.

jordan19.title: Great for length!
jordan19.description:
I don't think this is my favorite mascara, but I'm using it in the meantime until I find something better. My eyelashes are already super long, and this mascara just intensifies that. However, it doesn't do much for my volume and I don't find that my lashes look evenly full (benefit they're real does this quite a bit better-- maybe a difference in brush?). It also flakes some days. I like it for the most part but I think there's something better out there for me.
…read more

Lola71467.title: IN LOVE
Lola71467.description: This is by far the best mascara I have EVER tried. If you aren't good at applying it it looks clumpy, but once you learn, Wonderful!

darthmommy.title:
I didn't love this mascara as much as rep said at the store. I like the Bad Gal Lash more. Won't buy this again, it leaves my lashes clumpy and "spider leg" looking. The brush isn't that great either.
Disappointing to say the least :(

thekatiek.title: Better than sex? Not really.
thekatiek.description: The mascara does not live up to its name. It is messy and smudgy. It takes a while to dry so I almost always have mascara smudges on my upper lid that I have to rub off. It also flakes and gives dark circles under my eyes a few hours later... does not stay in place. It also clumps easily. If you are into that messy, clumpy look then this one is for you. It certainly does not separate lashes.

TXLove.title: WOW oh WOW!!!!
TXLove.description: I am obsessed with this mascara! I absolutely love the length and volume this mascara gives my short wimpy lashes! After I apply the mascara it honestly looks like I'm wearing false lashes. Two thumbs up!!

chinadoll12.title: raccoon eyes
chinadoll12.description: It read smudge free, FALSE!!! Raccoon eyes all day. Can't even wear it on the bottom lashes because it smear so bad. Waste of money. Don't recommend.

cmarie228.title: This makes my eyelashes very full and long, couldn't ask for a better mascara, been purchasing this for 4 years now and it has yet to fail me!

Jkruse.title: This is my new favorite mascara! I was skeptical because of some of the reviews but overall it is such an amazing mascara! It lengthens, volumizes , thickens, and separates your lashes and doesn't clump. Amazing formula and wand. I have to say it does flake sometimes but one flaw does not out weigh all of the maxing things this product does!

nelly1.title: love it!
nelly1.description: it really gives me a lots of volume and length! i do have to be a little careful while applying the mascara because of its big brush getting on my eyelid. BUt love that it is not waterproofed and easily removable. however, after a long day of work with this mascara, it starts flaking- which is ok with me since by that time, i am ready to wash my face and remove my makeup.

rubycorners.title: had high hopes
rubycorners.description: I absolutely love this mascara! It adds length and fullness, BUT, at the end of the day, I end up with black smears under my eye. I have been using the product continuously and continue to have the same problem. Today, I tried a different mascara, and no smearing. I'm so disappointed in this mascara that I bought.

Mariel25.title: best mascara ever
Mariel25.description: This mascara really works, i mean it really does give the tickness and dramatic look it promises

knh09.title: I am so glad I only tried this as a sample because it is AWFUL. It is ridiculously thick and it clumps soooooo bad. My lashes looked spidery and sharp. When I went to wash it off, it my lashes actually felt really sharp and crunchy. Definitely NOT what I look for in a mascara. WORST mascara I've ever used. If I could give it 0 stars, I would.

Stefani91.title: only buy the travel size
Stefani91.description: I only buy the travel size because the brush is better and the formula has less air in the container to make the product go bad. HOLY GRAIL

linda.title: I bought this mascara with the hope of having nice thick lashes. The brush was great however, the mascara was clumpy. I hated it and ended up returning it.

Gruvella.extra_info: Hair Condition Chemically Treated (Colored, Relaxed, or Permed)
Gruvella.title: I was seriously unimpressed by this mascara.  It was very flaky after about an hour of wear and frankly, my Voluminous does a better job for a fraction of the price.  The shape of the wand was also very frustrating to work with and I ended up blobbing mascara on my inner eye a few times.  Really cannot understand what the big deal is about this product at all.  I returned it immediately.

ajl12.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL
ajl12.description:
I swear by this mascara! It’s unfortunate to see some people saying it flakes. I’ve never ran into that issue and I’ve been using this for years. I tried other kinds of mascara that would shorten my eye lashes once I removed the mascara. My eyelashes would look thin and sparse. Not sure if there’s something in too faced mascara but it doesn’t shorted or weaken my eyelashes and it gives me a nice full set of eyelashes too Only thing is the price.
…read more

TyffM.title: Its ok
TyffM.description: I will say I see more volume from this mascara than from 'they're real' benefit mascara but it can be a bit flaky. I do like the thickness it gives my lashes and it comes off easy with makeup remover, I would definitely recommend this if you like thickness over length.

kaymomof3.title: In love !!!
kaymomof3.description: I'm really surprised with all of that bad reviews . This is by far the best mascara out the right now . The formula is incredibly dark and easy to apply , holds a curl and make my lashes look like falsies! !! There is no smell and it doesn't dry and flake off !!! Try it you won't be sorry .
