emmy232.title: I love this mascara my lashes look fuller and longer. Ive been using it everyday for almost three years now. I work at a night club and it stays on all night even after being sweaty!

torirm.title: great volume, but..
torirm.description:
This mascara is hands down the best mascara I've used in regards to volume and blackness. It almost gives my lashes a falsie look, without the feel of false lashes (I HATE falsies). Love the shape of the brush, love the deep black colour, and love that it doesn't clump. That being said, it does flake after 4-5 hours, and I find that I have to reapply around the same time to ensure my lashes stay looking nice and full and dark. If it wasn't for the flaking, and the fact it doesn't come in a waterproof formula, it would have gotten 5 stars.
…read more

JMJ608.title: Not repurchasing. Been using this for several months and it has never not smudged. Looks beautiful when first applied but I promise you will have raccoon eyes within a few hours. I'm not oily at all and have never really had a problem with my makeup running. But this mascara will do it to you every time

nikkipretty143.title: Love Hate Relationship
nikkipretty143.description:
I decided to try this mascara out based on reviews. My holy grail mascara is the They're Real Mascara by Benefit and if i'm feeling a need to splurge I will get the YSL Faux Cils mascara. This product is not worth the hype. This product has fall out and is clumpy when getting out of the tube. I do love this product for the darkening and thickness it provides but it absolutely gives no lengthening and curl to my medium length lashes. I would go with the They're Real masacra if you want to get better results for the same price.
…read more

AmyBowser.title: WOW!!!
AmyBowser.description: I have very short, straight lashes and this mascara is seriously a miracle worker. Not only does it help curl my lashes even without a eyelash curler but the length and volume it creates is seriously awesome!! After using this I am so spoiled that all my other mascaras just don't cut it anymore.

MakeupBySarai.title: This mascara is phenomenal!
MakeupBySarai.description: This mascara is amazing! It makes my lashes so thick and full. The other reviewers who are saying that you can't even see the brush are probably pumping the brush in and out of the tube! DO NOT PUMP MASCARA! ALWAYS TWIST IT GENTLY! If you pump it, you will get product build up on the brush and the mascara will dry out faster. You will also have a higher risk of bacteria.

pixisadoll.title: Amazing
pixisadoll.description: I got this by recommendation and I LOVE it! It is so much better than my other mascara. It is long lasting and buildable. I love love this product and will definitely be buying again. I am going to be gifting this for a few of my girlfriends who really need a great long lasting mascara. This was my first two faced product and now I cannot wait to try more.

Anniiie.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

1Bec.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

rondamac.title: One word: Perfection!
rondamac.description: I have tried many brands and this one was different from use one. Volumizing and dramatic from the first coat to the third. You can immediately tell the difference. I have tried more expensive mascaras that have done much less. The Sephora associate said they have had no returns to date on this product and after trying it I see why!

amira89.title: Flakey
amira89.description:
I've been a Benefit mascara lover for years, but felt that it was time to try something new. After seeing that this mascara was on all the top-lists, I decided to give it a try. I found the brush to be quite big and took getting used to, but after a few applications it became much easier. I also noticed that after a few hours of wear, under my eyes was black and I had flakes of mascara. I wasn't too happy with that, seeing as my other mascaras would last me all day + hot yoga. The mascara itself looked amazing, and gave my lashes tons of volume. It does exactly what it should do. I just didn't like how it flaked so much, making me look tired mid-way through the day. I don't see myself buying this mascara again. If I do, I'll likely try the waterproof one to see if that would be any different.
…read more

spockahontas.title: Like a dream
spockahontas.description: This mascara is everything I've always wanted. The volume is INSANE. Makes them thick too! I will forever purchase this mascara.

VTK084.title: Finally My Search Has Stopped...
VTK084.description:
For the perfect mascara. I have tried every brand, you name it, Chanel, Clinique, bought the Lash Stash from Sephora (which is cool too if you are looking to try different mascaras). Lancome was my winner but it was never perfect. Nothing was. I have very long eyelashes (even my own sister asked me once if I was wearing fakes) but they are super fine. Just like my hair. So I was looking for something that gave me volume without looking fake. This makes my eyes look both dreamy and natural at the same time. I have (naturally) light blonde hair and the black color looks great. I love this and will reorder it once the sample runs out, I am so very happy I got it. All this with just one coat too!
…read more

HNG87.title: Best mascara!
HNG87.description: I love this mascara because it is very easy to apply and it doesn't take 10 mins to make them pop! It makes your eyelashes look long, full, and healthy and not look like you're caking it on! This is now my go-to mascara! :)

aturn27.title: I bought a 5 piece mascara sample set and this was included. When I finally got to this one, I was expecting to be disappointed because the rest of the pack had disappointed me. However, I was completely surprised and fell love with how my lashes look. It builds very well and has a great color. Don't be afraid of the brush either.... its awesome!! My only problem with it is that it flakes slightly but doesn't smudge. It's still the best mascara I've used.

blakeash.title: LOVED it
blakeash.description:
Weirdly enough, mascara has always been the one thing I do NOT buy from Sephora, only because I've never found anything that I liked as much as a my go to from Loreal ...and I've tried TONS - from the least to most expensive. However, I will say that this is my new gotta have mascara, hands down. The first day I tried it, I got TWO "you have pretty eyes" and one "what mascara are you using?" I will say that I did read all the reviews, so the first thing I did before even trying it on was to put a tiny drop or two of super glue on the top after removing the wand, so as the round part that removes the excess didn't come off and leave me with a blobby mess, as I had read happens. Needless to say, I have had no problems whatsoever. Wand issues aside, I love the fact that the product is thicker, which I like. It's not a thin and watery, so for me I do not get spider eyes. I used to sometimes put my mascara in the freezer for a bit just to thicken it up and this reminds of that. My lashes are pretty long anyway, but even with just one coat it's like BAM! Normally I don't have the patience to just stick with one coat but with this I don't have that problem - because they get long enough with just one coat. And for going out, I don't want to over do it because I will seriously look like I have falsies on. It doesn't look bad, but it makes them so long and dark it almost TOO long and dark - NOT a problem I've encountered before! (Not that there's anything wrong with falsies...) Also, for some reason (maybe it's just me- probably is) I find that I tend to poke my eyes with certain types of wands - no idea why. Luckily this is not one of those types - hasn't happened once. Plus, the wand isn't so long that you accidentally get mascara on the bridge of your nose when you're trying to get the inner corners of your eyes. So, in a very lengthy nutshell, I absolutely give this the thumbs up. Oh, and did I mention that my lashes look so great now that I quit wearing eye shadow? It's like I don't need anything else now because my eyes are seriously popping like never before. And I'm 44!!
…read more

boww.title: RE-assessment
boww.description:
I am writing an additional review in hopes that Too Faced will take note. I originally assessed this mascara with a high review. Yes, I like the volume and intense look. But, after using this mascara for some weeks, I find that it no longer defines/separates my lashes as well as when I first bought it. The worst part about it is that there is so much goo on the brush. And, when I close it shut, it leaves so much residue on the outside of the bottle. Frustrating to have to continually wipe off the outside with a tissue. There is way too much product on the brush. Read that some shake the mascara bottle before use and also wipe the brush with a tissue in order to remove the excess. Will try these techs. Also, it does smudge below my lashes,( lower lashes) leaving me with no other option than to use another mascara for my lower lashes. The volume and thickness achieved in using this mascara is a given. Just need to work on the amount of product that comes out on the wand....excessive. And, I don't really like that I have to use another mascara for my lower lashes.
…read more

courtneym.title: Not worth the hype
courtneym.description: I've tried a ton of mascaras from high-end to drug store brands and this is by far the worst. This mascara leaves SO MUCH RESIDUE throughout the day! I had to constantly keep removing it from under my eyes as little as a half an hour after application! Back it goes!

emilymarie0.title: works a lot better when warmed up in your hands for a few minutes. can get clumpy if you're not careful. easy and smooth application. it's a great color and overall great mascara.

ContouringinTX.title: Flakes off at the end of the work day
ContouringinTX.description: I love the way this product looks until about 3 o'clock in the afternoon. That's about the time I start getting little black flakes under my eyes, which is particularly frustrating because I only put the mascara on my top lashes. I wish I could give this mascara five stars, because it really does make my lashes look longer, darker, and prettier.

ChloeRowland.title: Dry and Flaky
ChloeRowland.description: I was disappointed in this mascara. It is very dry and flakes off onto my under eye area.

CharHart.title: DON'T FEAR THE BRUSH!
CharHart.description:
Quite honestly I love this Mascara. I do have long lashes, so it doesn't clump them up or make them look bigger then they should, this mascara actually darkens my lashes and look classic no matter time of the day or what I am doing. Obviously the more you put on the bigger and full on they are going to be..which I will add as little extra if I am going out with friends on a Friday night. Though for general daytime use, for a natural look, you really only need a little bit. I would defenitly try the travel/trial version first so you can get used to using it. I would also recommend going to youtube and checking it out so you can see for your self on how to apply it. The brush it self does look scary and old school, as well as it looks like it would clump up your eye lashes, but believe me it won't. I am a 36 year old mother, and this past year my skin, skin tone and everything in general have been making some pretty dramatic changes, so I have been having to change make up and styles and such, and I have been spending quite a bit of money for these changes. But then I have been coming across products such as this and thankful I have.
…read more

almal20.title: I tried the travel size first ($12) just to see if it really lived up to the hype and I must say that I was impressed at the first use. My eyelashes looked longer and more full than they had ever looked. But after a couple hours it began to flake and leave a black residue under my eyes. God forbid you ever fall asleep wearing this because you'll wake up looking like a raccoon. If it was waterproof I would rate 5/5!

Tabitha83.title: It's true
Tabitha83.description: Love this mascara! I was iffy at first because I was a layer kinda gal when it came to mascaras. Layering is not a great idea, it will be clumpy and thick. After giving up layering I found this to be an amazing mascara.

ytlea.title: They're not the same :/
ytlea.description: I found a difference between the mini and the full size. The mini seems to work better and it doesn't clump what so ever. So then I decided to try the full size and I was surprised to see that it clumped. Over all I feel like it's a good mascara but the mini is better. :)

aammaanndah.title: I used to LOVE this mascara!! I've bought it over 6 times but now I am seeing it tends to flake off through out the day and give me raccoon eyes. I must say if it did not do that I would give 5 stars. So sad I am going to go mascara hunting again :/

rlm1990.title: I got this mascara a few months ago and was a little disappointed.. it doesn't live up to all the hype. I found it flaked and I couldn't get away with more than 1 coat without it looking really clumpy. Wouldn't recommend or buy again.

LipstickZealot.title: My new favorite!
LipstickZealot.description:
I love this mascara. I noticed the other reviews about having problems after two weeks. I haven't run into any quality issues and I have used everyday since April 30th. Still going strong. I have some eyelashes on my upper lip that grow downward. No matter how much I curl them they stick straight down, annoying. Well this is the first mascara that actually has enough staying power to keep them curled up with the rest of my lashes. Beautiful, my husband even commented on how long and curly they were (he doesn't EVER notice anything, lol)
…read more

FeliciaC79.title: nope!
FeliciaC79.description: Didn't love it, but since everyone loves it, I put aside my beloved Lancôme and bought the travel size. I don't get the hype. Within a few hours, it was flaky on my skin. The tube of mascara dried up super quick as well. I'll take sex over this mascara, thank you very much. Doesn't live up to its name, and probably the only Two Faced product that I don't like.

faithorchid.title: Not so Much
faithorchid.description: I've bought drugstore mascara that's better than this. This mascara flakes within a few hours. It clumps when being applied and does nothing for my eyelashes.

amymack.title: flakey
amymack.description: Very lengthening and voluminous at the beginning of the day, but begins to flake throughout the day

jenngetsnaked.title: jenn007
jenngetsnaked.description: ANYWAYS I bought this mascara in waterproof and oh my gosh! I LOVE LOVE LOVE! I cannot tell you how much I love this mascara I got some many compliments on my eye lashes because of it. 23 bucks f*** ya worth the price!!!

makenzieeeb.title: I loved this mascara for the first two weeks but then it get clumpy and I would find mascara all over my cheeks by the end of the day.

gpsailor89.title: almost amazing
gpsailor89.description: love this mascara!! it builds so well and gives you volume, but if you have tiny lashes it will clump

allbear.title: I LOVE this mascara. Definitely one of my top faves and something I would purchase again. For someone who has naturally long but light and therefore thin and not quite voluminous lashes, this mascara is a miracle. Although it can clump at times all you have to do is gently wipe away excess mascara from the brush. One good coat is really all it takes. It darkens lashes, gently curls them, and gives to-die-for volume. This mascara may just be better than s*x. Or at least it'll get you more s*x.

browneyes2.title: Love it
browneyes2.description: I am so picky on my mascara but I finally tried this one. So glad I did I love it. Not only was it easier to put on due to the shape of the brush but it also made my lashes look fuller. I and it is easy to take off. If you haven't tried it you have to.

Tasha8705.title: I LOVE this mascara. I didn't give it 5 stars because, I agree with other reviews, it can be a bit clumpy- but it has not been bad enough that I take a comb through. If you are looking for a va-va-voom- almost false lash look, this is the mascara for you. I already have long lashes, and this mascara takes them to the next level with length and some volume- I get compliments often when I use this mascara- which has become my daily go to- it is sometimes my only makeup to wear- and it gives my eyes a great pop. It does not take too much take it off- in my opinion- normal make up remover does the trick, easily. I really love mascara in general- and this one is a keeper!

lindsaym123.title: Volumizing, but clumpy and thick
lindsaym123.description: The brush is genius, however I find the mascara is clumpy to the point where it can separate my lashes, I do love this mascara though, with a proper and excellent application it looks great.

SamLuttrell.title: Why does everyone like it?
SamLuttrell.description:
I was so excited for this product because there were so many good, even great reviews about it. I spent $23 and tried it the next day. It was a MESS! This product could not last an entire day if my life depended on it! The product, throughout the day, magically came off. It did not flake, but it smeared like a nightmare. I have never had a mascara that smeared this much. This product was false advertising because it was definitely not better than sex. Dissatisfied and disappointed!
…read more

Drarry.title: Jerrod Get It Together
Drarry.description: When I first put this on, I LOVED it. However, at the end of the day all of the mascara was smudged under my eye. So, if you want to look like Jack Skellington be my guest. Honestly I am a virgin, so if this is better than sex then I'm becoming Queen Elizabeth I.

clzbailey.title: Definitely HG status for me. This mascara adds length and volume like you wouldn't believe. After giving birth to both of my girls my hormones caused my eyelashes to fall out. As a result there were many months where I only had tiny little stubs and very sparse. This mascara helped SO MUCH. It actually looked like I had a full set of normal eyelashes. I have bought this product over and over again for about three years already. When it starts to dry out I just add a few saline drops to the tube and it's totally useable again. I get a lot of wear from one tube.

pinupglamour.title: This definitely gives Benefit mascara competition
pinupglamour.description: i absolutely love this mascara is goes on wonderfully and I love the brush. It volumizes lashes and lengthens them. I think it gives Benefit Cosmetics a run for your money, they're both wonderful mascaras but I like this one better

carlzzz.title: volumizing
carlzzz.description: I really love how voluminous and thick this makes my lashes. It has never flaked or smudged for me like the other users point out.

Saharraf.title: creation of a virgin
Saharraf.description: I think the person who named this was a virgin. this is an OKAY mascara. very below average.. so not the hype

AndreaAn.title: Disappointing
AndreaAn.description:
I purchased this mascara in hopes of crazy voluminous lashes (like I read by other reviewers) and it did just that. It gave me amazing lashes but after a couple hours I had massive smudging and flake problems. It flaked all around my bottom lashes and would not stop no matter how many times I tried cleaning it. I have absolutely no idea what everyone else on here did to keep it looking flake free and beautiful but I know for me this mascara is not worth a repurchase.
…read more

claire1949.title: lengthens, but smudges ALOT
claire1949.description:
I wanted to love this mascara so much. I don't usually spend a lot for mascara and I do not pick up an expensive mascara without hearing a lot about it. I heard soooooo much hype about this mascara. Don't get me wrong, this mascara makes my eyelashes CRAZY long, separated, lots of volume. It is a good mascara, but I can't get past all the smudging and flaking. I have very long natural lashes with kind of oily eyelids and with a couple coats of this mascara in a few hours you can see little black smudge lines from my eyelashes!!! even worse on the bottom... just a mess. Even when I wipe it all away, if I wear the mascara all day when I go to remove it there is no mascara left because it's all flaked off..... I guess it makes removal easier. lol. Anyways, if you don't have oily eyelids or long eyelashes I would recommend, but I have a $3 mascara that does pretty much the same thing. (essence doll lash)
…read more

WinniSF.title: I initially received this product as a free sample. I loved how noticeable my lashes were with just one application. It truly provides volume, especially after about 3 coats. My fiance even thought I was wearing fake lashes! Downside is that the the wand is wide, so it makes it difficult in reaching the tiny lashes in the inner corners. Also it can start to clump if you try to apply more after the product dries on your lashes. Overall, I still love the way it makes my lashes look so I went ahead and bought the full size.

abbymathes.title: HOLY GRAIL
abbymathes.description: I don't think I have ever left a review on Sephora.com, but this mascara has prompted me to write one. I do not use this term lightly, but this is the real deal - a holy grail mascara! It does everything the package claims - lengthens, volumes, defines, and it's super black! I wasn't going to buy this, but I saw Zoella use it and had to. BUY THIS PRODUCT IT IS WORTH THE PRICE AND SO MUCH MORE!!!

Hollywoodchica.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

Briaanaa.title: Volumizing and voluptuous
Briaanaa.description: Great mascara and it does an incredible job in making your eyelashes look bold and voluptuous!

mza13.title: Love love love
mza13.description: I've gone through and experimented with many brands of mascara and this is my absolute one and only mascara I will always use. My lashes are very short and thin and this mascara thickens and lengthens without the clumping.

valeria0893.title: NOT WORTH IT!!
valeria0893.description:
If i can rate with 0 starts i would! I dont know what it it the deal with the mascaras these days, but i havent had the chance to find a good mascara and this is not the exception! It waay to clumpy! Like WAY TO CLUMPY! I was at the store and they make a big deal about this mascara so i bought it but i will return it ! It is heavy, clumpy and awful! I was so disappointed to spend my time and money buying this mascara. If you like clumps and heavy mascaras go for it, but personally i don't like it even a bit!
…read more

vmichellea.title: disappointed
vmichellea.description: Love the mascara the first ten minutes but throughout the day it flakes awful! Can't risk wearing it one day because the outcome is having the flakes and black smeared on your under eyes and face.

letsflyaway.title: BEST MASCARA EVER :)
letsflyaway.description: this is definitely the best mascara i've tried so far! it lengths and creates volume without clumping and spidery lashes. the only con i have is that its quite wet so i often have to clean up the mascara that ends on up on lid :/ but you get some, you lose some!

mirandakane11.title: Smears and Flakes
mirandakane11.description: I should preface this with the fact that I have long lashes and normal to dry skin. This product smears very easily, and also flakes really easily. I'm not sure how a product could be dry, yet smear at the same time. Oh! And I don't really like the brush either. Not worth it.

beccab00.title: love it
beccab00.description: Just tried this out for the first time today on its own and I love it. My lashes looked so much fuller and so did the roots. So glad I'm getting the full size version!

jfo908.title: Pretty darn good
jfo908.description: I've tried all types of mascara. This is definitely up there with one of the better ones. When I went out one night, someone asked me if I was wearing false lashes! So I guess I'd say the mascara does a pretty good job! :)

mkatie25.title: best mascara ever
mkatie25.description: When I first bought this product I felt like the mascara was too clumpy but actually it turned out looking great! Love this product and I'll definitely use it for a long time. Too Faced never fails to impress!

amlatson.title: The BEST and the WORST
amlatson.description: Without a doubt, this is the most amazing mascara I've ever used. BUT it smudges SO quickly and I can't stop that from happening no matter what I do. I can only wear it if I know I'm going to a short event. I would love to find a way to use this without the smudging. It would be the best mascara ever made. For real. But sadly, I can't buy it.

rhondababy.title: panda eyes
rhondababy.description: This stuff smudges and flakes. I don't usually have this issue and I've tried just about every mascara in sephora and drugstores. By the end of the day I have dark mascara smudges under my eyes and not much left on my lashes.

Yas0005.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL
Yas0005.description: I heard so many good things, and was disappointed when I got it. It’s super clumpy and messy. I would not recommend this product.

ADFlores.title: Nothing special
ADFlores.description:
Okay, so this is certainly NOT better than s*x. Honestly, I wasn't wowed in any way. I think the brush is an odd shape for my almond eyes. My left eye turned out beautifully, but the right just would not match. This isn't a problem I normally have and I'm convinced it's because of the odd wand. After attempting to even out the right eye, the mascara started to get goopy. Not wonderful. It isn't awful... but nothing special.
…read more

bourn2fly.title: Because of the great reviews I automatically bought it. However it was very goopy after the first couple of times I used it.

redfreckles.title: Perfect/Non Clump
redfreckles.description: A friend at work told me about this mascara - I was not sure/sceptical, however, I am very glad I purchased. I have some other Sephora mascaras and this is the best as it gives you length without the major clumps. I also find it bothers my eyes less.

OrientalWhisker.title: Love it, but smudges easily
OrientalWhisker.description: I love this stuff and got it as soon as it came out! It goes on dark and thick (but not clumpy). It really brightens up my eyes and makes them look wider and bigger! My only complaint is that it dries slowly and smudges very easy! I wish it were waterproof!

dancingdream99.title: The mascara that cannot be named!
dancingdream99.description:
I'm having a bit of a giggle because, apparently, we cannot refer to the name of this mascara in our reviews since the "s" word gets flagged as profanity. I got a small size of this mascara in the Everything Nice palette the other day and I quite like it. So far, no smudging (though that could change - I hope not, though). The brush is a bit weird - the shape and the spikiness of the bristles. This does give a bit more of an artificial look than I prefer in mascara (which is why I much prefer Bobbi Brown Intensifying Longwear). But this is a nice enough product. As for it living up to its name - well, unless your love life is in desperate need of help, I would think the name is more than a bit hyperbolic!
…read more

AshleyDeskins.title: My New Favorite
AshleyDeskins.description: I have probably tried every mascara you can possibly think of and this is definitely in my Top 2! Love to volume and it looks just as good at the end of the day as when you put it on the morning!!

Alenka15.title: Very disappointed!
Alenka15.description: I bought it twice. First time i had to return it because there was something wrong with the package, all mascara was on the brush when you pull it out. The second one worked ok, but I didn't like it at all. Still too much product on the brush, not long-lasting, very clumpy. I liked it only for first few times when it was very new. Not worth the money spent for sure.

ca67.title: I've finally found THE ONE!!
ca67.description: I love this stuff!! I'm not sure what's in the magical potion here, but it's awesome. The clincher for me, was when I saw a photograph of me wearing the mascara, and my eyelashes popped!! They looked like glamourous falsies! LOL I'll not be wearing any other mascara now. Oh, and it is also very very jet black. You've gotta try this!!

Modernaires.title: Best Mascara on the Market!
Modernaires.description:
I received a sample of this mascara in the Lash Stash holiday set. It adds volume, fullness, definition, length and leaves your lashes feeling flexible. It can be a little tricky to take off but in a good budge proof, water-resistant kind of way. I notice some slight curling as well, but I feel that may be the brush/wand over the formula. It's a great mascara and I'll definitely be purchasing a full sized once I'm done with my sample.
…read more

muggsymoo.title: Didn't like this mascara
muggsymoo.description: Since I have very short and thin eyelashes, I am always looking for a great mascara. I am an expert at applying and if I have a good mascara, my lashes look great. I did not like this mascara at all. It was very clumpy and did nothing for me. I tried it for 2-3 days to give it a chance, but really disliked this product.

sugarfix.title: Disappointed
sugarfix.description: I have tried a lot of different mascara a over the years, and was told this one was great. Sadly my normal mascara was out of stock. I have never had a mascara flake off so fast and smudge under my eyes. Love the brush it comes with just terrible formula.

makeupfan12345.title: a tip for fallout!
makeupfan12345.description: First time i purchased this mascara i loved the effect it had on my eyelashes but HATED the fallout so i returned it. Then i got a sample of the mascara and tried using a mascara primer (i used the Dior one) With a primer it does not flake off!

toofacedho.title: god help this mascara
toofacedho.description:
i am only writing this review because i am ticked off that i do not like this product when everybody else seems to love it. this mascara just doesn't do anything good for my eyelashes, and i've tried so hard so many times to love it but i get the same, god-awful results: -my eyelashes stick together in the middle of application making separation impossible -extremely clumpy -flaky the description of this mascara on here could not be farther from what i've experienced. "...separates..." excuse me......... it PUTS EM TOGETHER.
…read more

linderfaye.title: Best so far
linderfaye.description: Being of thin hair and short eyelashes, this has been the best volumizing mascara I have purchased. It grabs every little hair and thickens it!

bdeleon.title: Love/Hate
bdeleon.description: I bought this mascara about 3 weeks ago and I've absolutely loved it!!!! EXCEPT it dries out too fast. Within the second week of using it I had to wash the brush out and take the gunky mascara that was starting to build in it. I've been cleaning the brush once a week so it doesn't clump, but besides that it's amazing!

Abbiev93.title: The best mascara I've ever used!!! Totally worth the money. I've always had a hard time finding a good mascara but I've finally found it!

CamrynBolohan.title: Good then Ok
CamrynBolohan.description: This mascara is amazing the first few times you use it, but I find it dries out REALLY quickly and I have to constantly be buying new ones writhin a 2 weeks or so

windy.title: Intense Black Color...
windy.description: I have short stubby lashes, this product gave my lashes that deep black look, that made them look natural and thick not fake and messy...would buy this product again

bethi31.title: Disappointing
bethi31.description: For the price and the hype I expected a lot more. A huge fan of Too Faced and this was not even close to the quality of other items I have purchased. The mascara,on first use, was clumpy and did nothing spectacular to my lashes. I've had better luck with drug store brands than this.

irishfemme.title: Flaky flakes
irishfemme.description: I like the volume and texture of the mascara but I am having trouble with flaking throughout the day. I keep brushing flakes away and getting them in my eyes.

melreed717.title: least favorite high end brand
melreed717.description: Already have long lashes, and this mascara does nothing for them. This mascara is really globby, and I have to comb them out with a lash brush. I have serious raccoon eyes every day I wear this. Definitely not my favorite.

Hopesandreams.title: not worth it
Hopesandreams.description: This is not at all worth the hype. If you like defined lashes use something else. The brush makes everything clump together and it looks bad.

curlycue9.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

knava3.title: flakes!!!!!
knava3.description: When it first came out I was super excited to try it first week in and it was flaking like crazy threw it out, Weeks later I decided to purchase another tube and give it a chance(maybe I had got a defective one) nope same problem.

jnuhlane.title: I had high hopes...
jnuhlane.description:
The lovely makeup girl at my local Sephora recommended this when I asked for a new mascara ( had been using Clinique forEVER)... this came HIGHLY recommended by her and when I checked out the checkout counter was even telling me how great it was... then I started to use it. The first few tries were great, a little hard to remove but it was OK... then it got clumpy. The wand is a MESS now, and whenever I use it - i wind up having to take a cu-tip to my eyes and dab off the excess. Totally bummed on this one.
…read more

nxnw.title: My favorite mascara
nxnw.description:
I started using Dior Show when I was quite young, after 5 years of that obsession I noticed the formula started changing and didn't offer the same effect. So I began a quest to find a new favorite mascara; I tried just about everything under $40. I found Better Than Sex just shortly after it was released and have never gone back. Yes, it eventually dries out and gets a little clumpy but in my experience every mascara in this price point does sooner or later. You also get the potential for rub-off under your eyes since this stuff adds so much length, but once you get used to the fact you know to keep an eye out for it throughout the day. The pros completely outweigh the cons in my opinion. As long as you're patient and take the time to apply correctly, comb and touch up any goofs, you're going to have dark, full, lengthy lashes.
…read more

SammL94.title: Very Volumizing
SammL94.description: This mascara is my go-to. It coats each lash perfectly and does a great job of separating them. It's an intense black formula that makes my lashes look great. I love how this applies & I'll keep buying this one!

bottomofthemap.title: it's fyre
bottomofthemap.description:
I bought this mascara without ever hearing about it. I used Estée Lauder and other more expensive mascara before, what a waste that was. As soon as I put on BTS , I knew I wasn't gonna use any other mascara again. My lashes were full, and long and I only used one coat . I'm not quite sure what this whole flaking complaint is about , but I've never had that problem and I've been using BTS for more than a year. The only explanation I can come up with is that you guys probably put on several layers of the product and therefore it will flake, of course. Anyway, I looovvve this mascara , and I will use it until I can't use it anymore.
…read more

trixxi3thousand.title: awful
trixxi3thousand.description: Completely comes off on my face under my eyes. Clumpy waste of money.

LocaLgurLy85.title: my fave
LocaLgurLy85.description: I have tried many different brands and types of mascara and none has done to my lashes what this one has done. My lashes are long and full and lasts all day. Yes the brush causes some clumping at times, but that is really my only negative comment. That and it sells out of stores really quickly. Love this product.

iammacey.title: Very messy and clumps
iammacey.description: I was taken by the name but that's it! It was very messy and totally clumped my lashes. I sent it back. Sorry -

Holley08.title: Finally
Holley08.description: I love the idea of mascara but have never found a brand that worked on my thin short lashes. I tried this on in Sephora and was immediately hooked. It's like magic on my eyes. Every time I wear it I get a compliment. Worth the money.

jabughao.title: Best mascara
jabughao.description: Confused as to why this product doesn't have a full 5 stars! Best mascara I have ever purchased. I have very long lashes and most mascaras just clump my lashes together. This is the only mascara that separates and volumes each lash! Worth the money.

enfin777.title: Love this Mascara
enfin777.description: I have spent years looking for a great mascara and this one is it! Makes my eyes pop. Highly recommend

joshsangel.title: Love this!
joshsangel.description: I thought I had found true love with Benefits They're Real mascara but it dried out my lashes and flaked on my skin. This Better than ...(every time I try submitting this review it tells me there's profanity in it..assuming they don't like the name) mascara is AHMAZING! Gives me super plump, full, sexy lashes without the drying or flaking. Honestly new favorite.

chloebelle44.title: My first impression was how long it made my lashes look. I found that with two coats, this mascara did a wonderful job. With more than two, for me it was four, it became clumpy and got in your eyes. If you have a two coat maximum rule, this product is perfect.

natashanadia.title: This is definitely one of the best mascaras I've used! I love it! It really does add volume and fullness! I took a star off because of the price.

ladyinalaska.title: I have long, semi-thick eyelashes and I really love this mascara. As a person who likes light eye makeup, this mascara takes it to a different level!

kellye8498.title: Disaster in a tube
kellye8498.description:
I got this mascara and was so excited to try it because I love too faced. Unfortunately it was a disaster! It's clumpy and makes my lashes stick together so even my metal lash comb can't separate them. There were globs of the mascara on some lashes even. Not ok. I managed to get the clumps off my spider lashes and decided to wear it at home to do a full review and by lunch I had black flakes all over my eyes and cheeks. This is, by far, the worst mascara I've used and I have a collection of mascara that would make a "normal" person faint. xD Just a bad design. Maybe if they made the too of the tube a bit smaller to help get the excess mascara off but even wiping the brush with a paper towel to blot off the excess didn't help. Back it goes.
…read more

JennaBSunshine.title: ! the best!
JennaBSunshine.description: I've tried a different brand of mascara every 3 or 4 months for about 3 years! And this is the jackpot! Sexy and full lashes! No clumping, no spider lashes, no reapplication necessary! you can't go wrong !

Alice64.title: over hyped but a good buy
Alice64.description: This mascara has a really dark pigment and adds so much length that people have asked if I was wearing fake lashes. However it can be very flakey and clumpy. It's not better than sex but it's a good mascara.

Meribor.title: doesn't do the job
Meribor.description: The brush is too big for my tiny lashes. It doesn't last very long. It clumps. It ends up smeared under my eye within an hour or two. Nope.

KristenSw.title: Looks Great At First
KristenSw.description: This mascara delivers its promises at first by giving you lashes that pack a punch, but as the day goes on the mascara fades and flakes everywhere! Very disappointing. This is no longer my go to and I can't wait until this tube is done so I can try something else.

CarlyFerg.title: I bought the same size of this mascara. Overall a good mascara, but not worth the price of a full size, in my opinion. I'm not sure who called it "better than sex", because it certainly isn't. Makes me wonder what kind of sex they're having...

drnic.title: Nope.
drnic.description: Wanted to like it but didn't. The formula took forever to dry on my lashes, which I could get around. What I can't get past is the fact that I was washing my hands and water splashed a bit in my eye..and this mascara ran down my face. I understand it's not waterproof, but it should have at least some staying power. Returned it.

lisajess.title: not good
lisajess.description: Flakes so bad your eyes will be black after a few hours of wearing it, way to expensive too.

julietteSK.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

Leaahelaine.title: YES!... Oh wait
Leaahelaine.description:
I thought I had hit the mascara jackpot, then I noticed it started getting more difficult to apply and it wasn't completely saturating my eyelashes like it had previously. Once you break in a mascara its the best time to use it, but I feel like with this one once you finally get to that point it seemed to dry out and not want to do its job. In order for me to be able to use it I have to warm the tube up with hot water to get it to corporate. Almost more hassle than its worth.
…read more

greenleaf777.title: Nice but not better than sex
greenleaf777.description: I wouldn't say this mascara lives up to its name but its decent enough. The flaking at the end of the day is quite irritating especially for the eyes but you do get some nice separating and length. Also I did find the shape of the brush a bit awkward.

CassyBoBassy.title: not quite better than sex
CassyBoBassy.description: I really do love this mascara if it weren't for the fact that after 5-6 hours of wear my eyes start to become very irritated. Other than that it makes my lashes look long thick and as black as my heart. Will be buying this product again as its the best I've come across so far.

pettyprincess.title: yikes
pettyprincess.description: i had a feeling i wouldnt like this and i was right. it lengthens and all that but it flakes everywhere within an hour. definitely not better than sex

Mary8675.title: good
Mary8675.description: definitely makes your lashes look crazy good but it can be a little clumpy and smeared when I applied my setting spray. i would recommend this though because it makes your lashes so long.

MelinaGh.title: Okay its a great mascara for people who already have pretty long lashes. i have a friend that has short lashes and it did almost nothing for her, but i have pretty long natural lashes so i mean i guess thats why it was so good for me. Its only clumpy at first once i apply a few coats it looks better. Recommend it for people with long lashes.

JValley0714.title: Holy Wow
JValley0714.description: This stuff is awesome! Full eyelashses are no problem and it definetly lengthens. I wouldn't recommend this for somone who is solely looking for a defining maskcara as it can get clumpy.

RxyH.title: Don't know why people love this so much. All it did for me is clump. If I got the clumping down to a minimum it did nothing for my lashes.

taylorlanae.title: In Love
taylorlanae.description: I have an ok length for eyelashes that don't curve and are light. I was pretty hesitant about getting this, but I heard great things. So one day, I said why not? Best decision eve for my eyelashes. The mascara makes them so long and dark and voluminous and I get lots of compliments. 10/10 would recommend

merrickt.title: dont get this mascara
merrickt.description:
This mascara (should I even call it this because its more like black gunk) clumps my lashes and DOES NOT separate. Yes, it makes my lashes longer, but not any longer than a regular drugstore mascara. I thought that getting a high end mascara would work better than my drugstore one. its not, in fact its worse. Its also flaky and if you have it on for a really long time then it flakes off completely. I would never buy this product again.
…read more

Knguyen28.title: my favorite!
Knguyen28.description: Always go back to this mascara! Used to use Benefit's They're Real, but this one isn't as drying on the lashes and makes them look thicker.

Aurora513.title: love it!
Aurora513.description: I've tried every hypoallergenic and "safe for contact lens users" mascara you can imagine and NONE worked....ONLY this one!!! This one is the perfect fit for those that, like me, want great lashes but are allergic to almost every mascara in the market!

Kickboxerkelly.title: One of my favorites
Kickboxerkelly.description:
I've tried so many mascaras this year. I always do my research and pick the best ones. But I keep coming back to this mascara. It volumizes and actually lengthens substantially. It provides a bit of a curl too! It doesn't get spidery like Benefit's They're Real. My other fave is lash domination but BTS just makes my lashes so much longer. I will always have a tube of this on hand even though I keep experimenting with other mascaras.
…read more

Cursivecandy.title: looks great, smudges during the day
Cursivecandy.description:
I will say this is probably my favorite mascara visually - it makes my lashes look full and super long. On a regular makeup day (foundation, concealer, and translucent powder under the eye) this mascara starts to run big time around the 5 hour mark. I had full on raccoon eyes in the middle of my work day - I wouldn't purchase this again. I don't have issues normally with mascara running and gave this a week's worth of use before leaving this review. I was in an AC'ed building all day and this thing STILL ran
…read more

lubogle.title: nope
lubogle.description: Flakey with terrible fallout and makes your lashes clump. Don't buy it.

fly2neverland.title: Love!
fly2neverland.description:
My experience with this product has been wonderful so far! I've used the same drug store mascara since I can remember because I can never find another one I've liked. I've heard so many good things about this mascara I made my first expensive makeup buy and picked it up. I LOVE it! It's very light and gives my lashes length, volume, and a whimsical look to them. I only rate 4 stars because I've experienced very minor flaking when applying (no flaking for me throughout the day) and I wish it came in a waterproof option.
…read more

SarahBeth006.title: Oh SO much "Better Than S-x!!!" ;)
SarahBeth006.description:
I thoroughly read the majority of reviews (good AND bad) prior to purchasing anything. I have very short, basically nonexistent eyelashes and I have had trouble finding mascara that will give me the WOW factor. I was very excited to try this but nervous due to the bad reviews, therefore I got a sample of it. First, let me say I am in LOVE. I am a female firefighter, therefore I like to wear a touch of makeup to still feel a bit feminine, but I cannot go all out on a daily basis. I have had problems in the past with mascaras flaking off or rubbing off and getting in my eyes when I have my gear on and it can cause a big problem. 'Better Than S-x' doesn't disappoint!!! I usually use 2-3 coats (letting it dry in between), but even after just ONE coat, my eyelashes look amazing! YES, it Is a thick mascara and appears to be "globby" on the tube. But, its a very simple fix. Take your eyelash brush/comb and run it through the bristles. I have only had to do this once and the thickness of it is what makes it so amazing! Once it is dry, no flakes all day and it doesn't rub off easily either! I STRONGLY recommend this. My husband has even commented on my "sexy" lashes! Just purchase it or you can get a sample in the Sephora Lash Stash Sample Kit. It will be the best choice you ever make! I mean c'mon... it Is 'Better than s-x!!"
…read more

jcckie.title: Love love love!
jcckie.description: I absolutely love this mascara! It adds volume, length, and extra curl!

SaraSy.title: nice but smudged by end of day
SaraSy.description: This is great if you like a full look. It curls and lifts and adds volume. But by the end of day I have black smudges under my eyes and I only use it on my top lashes.

ACOLOMBE.title: Good effect, fast to dry out
ACOLOMBE.description: I really enjoyed using this product. I found that it gave a beautiful fanning and thickening effect to my lashes. The downside of this product is that it dries out quite quickly and becomes very clumpy and hard to work with.

Kimmystar23.title: MAGIC IN A TUBE!
Kimmystar23.description: I adore this mascara so much! it makes my lash look amazing long and yet so pretty. it es everything is says. i got the small size. a mouth ago from using it at once l i had notice that my lashs have been longer which just wows me for what this can do... this stuff is magic in a tube! it's a must have and i cant live without this!

isukiii.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

ariana924.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

veritabelle.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

KiaraAlexis.title: Good Product, Mediocre Brush
KiaraAlexis.description: I recommend this for its volume and pigment. I like the product but the brush can cause it to clump and requires more effort than should be necessary. Formulation seems to be great but after a few hours the color can transfer to my brow bones. All it really needs is a better brush and more staying power and it would be perfect.

LoveForLife.title: Doesn't Live Up To It's Name
LoveForLife.description:
I got this as a gift along with the Too Faced 3-way eye liner. I love the liner but this mascara is just meh. This is my first high-end mascara and I was expecting much more from it since it is high end and Too Faced is normally pretty good. The brush is more hourglass shaped than shown so I don't know if that has anything to do with it, but when you put it on it's super clumpy, but you can get the clumps out which leaves you with super dramatic eyelashes, which I don't really prefer for everyday wear, but for special occasions it's prefect. However, it doesn't seem that this mascara drys at all. After about 30 minutes, I went to move my hair away from my face and my palm barely grazed my eye and the mascara was everywhere and all of my lashes had stuck together towards the outer corner of my eye. Personally, I prefer my drugstore ones but I'll probably use this one and avoid touching my face just so it doesn't go to waste. Just really disappointing.
…read more

userrr5.title: okay....
userrr5.description: Not too impressed with this product- very clumpy but it does give good volume so I will give it that. Don't think I will be re-purchasing...

elianaxlc.title: better than sex mascara
elianaxlc.description:
This is probably the best mascara I have ever used!! Although it's not water proof I never wear makeup when I'm surfing because NOTHING meets my standards:)But so many of my friends have complemented me saying if I wear fake lashes!! I recommend this to everyone!!!!!! There is one change I wish they could make though, I wish it went on smoother when I put it on:1 But over all best mascara ever
…read more

crivers.title: Love love
crivers.description: i have length but i needed volume w/o clumping and this does the trick and even adds a little length! I use a little translucent powder on my eyelashes first, apply this and it doesnt run at all for the full day!!

misshoneybby.title: This is probably the best thing ever from too faced . I'll never buy another mascara again . Makes my lashed look fake and I get compliments all the time...and seeing as I live in Texas and everyone loves their mascara here that says alot

Aimsyy.title: Loads of Volume and Length!
Aimsyy.description:
I've been on the great hunt for a mascara that really delivers and lives up to its talk, but I'd never found one. Until I tried on this mascara at Sephora and it has honestly been life-changing. It gives such great volume and length, I love it! I can see in pictures how great my lashes look, and it gives me such a surge of confidence! It also has the bonus of not cumpling, and giving my lashes such a beautiful dark coat. Better than sex? I'm sure many people could argue that. Better than all the mascaras I've tried (alot)? Definitely, without a doubt!
…read more

rikspiks.title: Better than what I had, still lacking
rikspiks.description:
In full disclosure, I will repurchase this until I find a better mascara. I like that it is thickening and the black is great. It doesn't flake off. However, the brush and tube design is odd. I continually have to clean the brush because the edges of the hourglass shape, so I just am basically wasting product. The formula is so heavily thickening that it actually undoes the curl I put in my lashes which is frustrating. I made the switch from a drugstore brand, but may just switch back if I find myself in a drugstore before a sephora.
…read more

hamacle.title: ignore the bad reviews!
hamacle.description:
I had a distant friend recommend this mascara to me but I wanted to check out all the online reviews first--I swear I watched so many videos and read so many reviews and honestly the majority said it would be clumpy, spidery, cakey, and overall not worth it. I went ahead and ordered it anyways and I'm so glad I did. Yeah, if you put three full coats on like the box suggests, it's not going to look good. but its such a good mascara that you don't need to take it that far. One coat gives me really defined and volumized, longer, and slightly curled lashes without even making it look like I have a ton of mascara on (and i have very light colored lashes). Two coats is perfect for going out or wanting to look a little nicer. I have had no problem with the weird shaped brush or clumping issues, if anything my lashes have been more defined and separated than with any other mascara i've tried. like I said though, avoid putting on three full coats or else you will have those issues. Overall, I'm so happy. never cared about my lashes and now i do! "better than s*x" though is a totally awful name and should probably be more like "you're probably not having great s*x so you might as well buy some decent mascara"
…read more

retrovixen.title: In the world of cosmetics, it is better than s*x
retrovixen.description:
This mascara has changed the way I view my makeup routine. One coat was very natural looking and defined. Two coats is stunning and my lashes look amazing. Three coats and my lashes seem to enter the room before I do! They're thick, full, voluminous, and curly! These are all words I would NEVER attribute to my natural lashes which are stick straight, sparse, and thin. This mascara definitely gives you the appearance of false lashes without having to deal with glue and the possibility of having them look weird. I love this mascara and I have absolutely NOTHING negative to say (which is a miracle because I do like to complain lol). Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a new mascara :)
…read more

amanda45.title: decent mascara
amanda45.description: I absolutely love how this mascara makes my lashes look, but unless I don't put mascara on my lower lashes, it flakes all under my eyes. It even does this sometimes when I leave the lower lashes natural, but you can't beat the volume that it gives you.

Suheer.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

VanSlappy.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

itshannahqurl.title: Broke By Fourth Use
itshannahqurl.description: I only used mine 4 times and it was broken. There was mascara everywhere. I wasted $20 on this and I'm very upset about it.

ChristinaKiou.title: Great for volume
ChristinaKiou.description: Such a great mascara. I have a lot of long eyelashes and it adds volume like crazy but it doesn't do much with length.

legallyblondie.title: Fab Mascara, but not better than s-e-x ;)
legallyblondie.description:
I used my usual mascara primer (Dior), and one coat of Better Than S-e-x Mascara over the primer made my lashes full, long, and separated--really amazing! I barely needed a second coat (and I always use a second coat of my favorite mascara, Diorshow). Today I tried it layered on top of Benefit's BADgal and loved it even more. I haven't noticed the smudging and fall out that people mention in other reviews, but I do use Urban Decay's All Nighter setting spray every day (another holy grail product). My lashes are naturally long and curly so I can't speak to the curling properties, but if you love voluminous eyelashes, this is the product for you. This mascara is definitely going into my permanent rotation, but is it better than s-e-x? Negative. ;) (I'm not sure why Sephora won't let me use the S word, since it's a) not profanity and b) the NAME OF THE PRODUCT.)
…read more

missnanci.title: Luv this mascara!
missnanci.description: I love this mascara, it doesn't even require for me to use an eyelash curler. My only recommendation is that you use an eyelash groomer/brush/definer because it can come on clumpy and if your not careful give you spider eyes.

crt926.title: Not my favorite
crt926.description: This product was super clumpy and did not lengthen as I was hoping. Definitely not my favorite.

TinkaM.title: just ok
TinkaM.description: This mascara isn't bad, it does give volume as promised. It does clump badly but easy to get under control with your eyelash comb. My biggest problem is that it rubs off badly on my upper eyelid so I'm constantly removing black smudges all day.

Ailynchacon.title: HOLY GRAIL MASCARA
Ailynchacon.description: I just love how it makes my lashes look so full and fluffy!!!!!!!! My number one fave mascara :-)

Ngangy.title: Why
Ngangy.description: I don't get the hype. This mascara did not lengthen, thicken, darken or anything! My lashes look naked. Considering the name, I feel sorry for the TF team. Hope they have better experiences in *that* department soon.

Beatleschick.title: HG but imperfect
Beatleschick.description:
This mascara is without a question my HG. I find that it gives me instant volume, length, darkness, separation... everything you could ask for in a mascara. The brush is great; it's simple but does the trick. I rarely get any clumping together of my lashes when I use this product, and my lashes always look full and fabulous with it on. Not to mention it's paraben free! Now, that being said, if you want the amazing results this mascara gives, you have to be patient with its flaws. It is a bit flaky, especially when it's being removed, and often times I end up with tiny smudges under my eyes at the end of the day. It also is definitely soon not waterproof, and I've cried it off many a time. Despite its questionable wear time, I keep going back to this mascara because it gives me more drama than any other. If you're a fan of dramatic lashes and aren't bothered by mild smudging, then you'll love this one.
…read more

Cece8.title: Disappointed
Cece8.description:
Purchased mascara after Sephora employee raved about how great the product was. She said other customers loved it, its a top selling product, blah blah blah. I purchased it and so did my mom. We are both disappointed and do not like the product. It flakes, runs and I have to check my eyes frequently to make sure I don't have racoon eyes. I also do not like the large wand and the way the mascara just clumps on it. What a waste of money. I am better off buying the $8 mascara I have used for years.
…read more

ShylaWalker.title: overrated
ShylaWalker.description: This mascara is pretty overrated it gets like clunky and dried up super quick .

angelixmay.title: not better than sex
angelixmay.description: My two friends swear by this mascara so I finally caved in, and wasn't that impressed. I feel like it clumps all my lashes up and puts way too much product. But I have asian eyelashes that go straight down so finding a good mascara is impossible. To be fair, it works really good on my friends eyelashes

projectrunway.title: Clumpy & Flat
projectrunway.description: Everyone has been raving about this mascara and I really wanted to like it. However, it gets very clumpy when I use it to lengthen my lashes and my eyelashes uncurl/goes flat right away. It would be a good mascara for volume solely, and only when using it sparingly.

emlouiseturner.title: Amazing!
emlouiseturner.description: This is my absolute favourite mascara ever. Its so thick and full and makes me look like I'm wearing fake eyelashes. It lengthens and thickens... Perfect!

marygranellaf.title: Great!
marygranellaf.description: I got this mascara as part of a Christmas gift last year and, to be honest, I immediately became obsessed! I don't have thick lashes at all but this makes them look three times thicker and darker. It does dry out rather fast and can end up looking too heavy on your eyelashes if you add too many coats.

Leeci.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL
Leeci.description: flakes everywhere and ruins all other makeup you put on, don't waste your time.

danaxn.title: sex is better
danaxn.description: Make your lashes significantly longer and have more volume but it was only great the first two times, after that it started making my lashes look clumpy and stick together

makeupaddictrn.title: Takes some getting used to, but worth it.
makeupaddictrn.description: This mascara makes your lashes lush and long. That being said, there's an issue with the wiper inside the bottle, and sometimes it just doesn't work and you wind up with a wand completely coated with product. Hopefully they work on that. I haven't had a problem with smudging or flaking. I get pretty dramatic, not clumpy lashes. I'd have given it 5 stars if not for the wiper problem.

AlwaysWantMore.title: Good but thought it would be better!
AlwaysWantMore.description: I read the reviews and saw how everyone raved about this mascara. It's not half bad but I was expecting more. It doesn't volumize or lengthen as much as I thought and it clumps more than I'd like. Overall I'm happy with it but I can't say I'd buy it again.

vmglasner.title: This is my number one mascara forever and ever.
vmglasner.description:
I love this mascara more than anything in the whole world. I can dab a little on for a natural look or I can layer in on for an intense, dramatic look. It volumises like no other mascara ever could. It also is amazing at adding length and curl and definition. It dries pretty quickly, but I always save mascara as the last step in my makeup routine so I don't have to worry about it. It is also the strongest waterproof I have ever experienced in a mascara. I can sob uncontrollably and look in the mirror afterward and not have to reapply because my mascara has not budged. It doesn't run or clump or anything!!! I mean, come the end of the day, it is a beast to get off, but I've got a great makeup remover, so I don't mind (Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes, I swear by them!). Two critiques: If I wear concealer under my eyes, I do get a little bit of black gunk under my eyes by the end of the day, but if I don't wear foundation, or if I keep up my powder application throughout the day, I don't run into this problem. It's never too hard to wipe off. It comes off pretty easily with my finger, no smudging. And OH, how I wish this mascara came in BROWN. That's not really a critique, but I really do wish I had this is in brown for those days I feel like looking really natural. I recommend this mascara to anyone and everyone. It is my one true love. Forever and Ever. Amen.
…read more

jasy15.title: An ok mascara but.....
jasy15.description: This mascara is ok when used on it's own but it turns to a the best mascara when used with a waterproof mascara before applying this product

MakeupMeag.title: Hands Down BEST Mascara
MakeupMeag.description:
This is hands down the best mascara I've ever used. Now I'll admit, this mascara isn't for everyone. I prefer to have thick, long lashes, and that's exactly what this mascara does to my lashes. It suggests anywhere from 1-3 coats for a gradual intensified effect, but I found myself because pleased with simple 1-2 coats at most. The hourglass brush is genius and I'll never look at another mascara ever again. In absolute LOVE with the product. Highly recommended to anyone who wants full, thick, lengthy lashes.
…read more

Allanoutme.title: flakey
Allanoutme.description: I find by the end of the day I have flakes of mascara all over my eyes

leen1.title: LOVE!!!
leen1.description: Best mascara I have tried to date! DId not clump easily or smudge.

Nialovely.title: lengthening
Nialovely.description: This mascara came with A Few of My Favorite Things palette (which I absolutely love and recommend) and I really enjoyed it because it gave volume and length to my short super thin straight eyelashes.. Will purchase soon!

GinaGiampa.title: I like the wand, it makes my lashes look good, but a few hours later, it will shed so much it looks like I have under eye circles

lupex3.title: To clumpy
lupex3.description: It clumps up my lashed to much :(

Ariel5.title: Flakes
Ariel5.description: Volume, yes. Long wear, no. This mascara would be excellent if it lasted all day without flaking and giving me raccoon eyes. Constantly checking in the mirror to wipe under my eyes. Love the volume though, it only takes one coat. But even with a lash primer, it doesn't hold. And yes, they've changed the tube so the handle is longer and you get less product.

danniedenise.title: Goood Volumizing Mascara
danniedenise.description: PROS: This is a good volumizing mascara. It goes on thick and a couple of coats is enough. It comes off easily with makeup wipes. CONS: After about 4 hours, I've experienced the mascara smudging especially on the lower lash line. Plus there is a little bit of flaking. This is better for short-term wear (less than 4 hours)

Emmorty.title: Annoying
Emmorty.description: I want to love this, but it smudges really easily, and I find it transfers all over the place...yet at the end of the day when it is time to remove my makeup, it is nearly impossible to remove.

Jyllian.title: Too clumpy
Jyllian.description: Looks like I am in the minority because I was not impressed with this mascara. Its is clumpy and a lot of product gets stuck on the wand and you have to scrape it off prior to using. Then, during the day it will create blackness/shadow under the eye. I will not purchase again. BUMMED!

tinabunny.title: Not effective for straight Asian lashes
tinabunny.description: I had a lot of high hopes for this mascara from all the rave reviews, however it ended up a disappointment. I have short-ish, very straight, Asian lashes. I always curl my lashes before applying mascara. This mascara completely took the curl out and didn't do anything for my volume. It also smudged on me as the day progressed. The packaging is nice though...

atomicAmberlynn.title: Fantastic Mascara!
atomicAmberlynn.description:
My lashes looked thick and were the blackest I have ever seen. I have very long lashes, but no thickness. I struggle to find a great mascara that thickens rather then lengthens. This is the one!! It is a little hard to use. If you are not careful you can coat your lashes with too much product and they clump together. Don't get discouraged!! I also love how soft and silky my lashes feel, even though they are covered in mascara! Quick Tip: This mascara is one you MUST wipe the applicator brush off, then apply. This way your lashes will not be clumpy.
…read more

ashleyc132.title: Amazing!!
ashleyc132.description: I'm a big fan of Too Faced products and this was my first mascara from the brand. I absolutely loved it. I have very sensitive eyes and most mascaras irritate my eyes, but this mascara did not one bit. It thickens and lengthens the lashes amazingly.

callmefall.title: Not Worth the Price
callmefall.description: It was way too clumpy for paying 23 dollars! Not a fan.

Lyas.title: Amazing, never had such a good mascara

bananagrams.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

xayasouk90.title: Saw a review for this on youtube, so I decided to give it a try. Hands down one of my all time favorite mascaras I've ever tried!!!

sephoraceratops.title: #1 Mascara
sephoraceratops.description: As a contact lens wearer, this is my go-to mascara. Brush is fluffy and defines each lash with some serious pigment.

makeupaddict205.title: better than sex mascara
makeupaddict205.description: Overrated in my opinion. My drugstore mascara is better than this mascara. This mascara doesn't hold the curl in my lashes at all by the end of the day and it doesn't even look like I'm wearing mascara when I have it on after only about over an hour. Disappointed in this product because I heard nothing but greatness about it.

ARodz24.title: No Lengthing just Clumpy
ARodz24.description: Me & My sister are Very disappointed in this product. My sister has already fulk and long lashes but this product made her eyelashes clumpy and heavy. I have short lashes and got this product to see if it can help in length. Nope. Just made mine clumpy and black was everywhere on my eyes. Waste of money.

AllieErin.title: Holy Grail
AllieErin.description: This mascara. Oh girl. It's extremely lengthening and gives the lashes an incredibly dramatic look, curling the lashes & bringing volume from base to tip. Doesn't clump too much if you apply in thin coats while waiting in between coats for it to dry. Have repurchased this mascara three of four times now & I am so so happy with it. I don't think any other mascara will be able to top this one.

jjd4.title: Best mascara I've tried. The only thing I don't like is it does leave black under my bottom lashes occasionally

cartoongirl.title: too chunky
cartoongirl.description:
Bought this mascara with high hopes. However I find that way too much product comes out on the wand. To where I have to wipe off the excess. As if there's nothing inside to stop all of the mascara goo from coming out. I'm not sure if my specific wand is defective or what. But I'm thinking about bringing it back. Which is something I hardly do. However once I wipe the excess mascara off, the mascara works decently. You only need to go over your lashes once. No need for build-up with this mascara. A little bit of product goes a long way.
…read more

Rena27.title: Love this mascara!
Rena27.description: I absolutely love this mascara! I love the They're Real mascara as well, but this one has definitely taken over. You truly do only need one coat and it's so volumizing! It literally looks like you're wearing false lashes when you use this mascara. I DEFINITELY recommend it! It's incredible and completely worth the price.

Mkg823.title: Title Says It All
Mkg823.description: Tried the sample of this in the best mascara collection. In fact, it was the first I tried from it! I love it and once I run out, I definitely will get full sized

saycaity.title: Needs to be redesigned.
saycaity.description: The opening of the tube is way too wide so the brush comes out overloaded with product. This makes application really difficult. I haven't been able to get a decent application from it yet. I checked the tester in the store and it has the same super-wide opening so I know it wasn't a defunct unit. Not a great choice for defined lashes.

AshxlReviews.title: LOVE this mascara.
AshxlReviews.description: This is a very buildable mascara. It feels lightweight and doesn't flake or run off throughout the day. It also makes my lashes look very thick and black. I love it's hourglass shape, although it is large for my short lashes. It also isn't great for my bottom lashes, because the tip is so large. I still love the results and would definitely repurchase this item!

XCCheerTrack.title: Disappointing product. Looks amazing during the first two hours of wear but makes my under eyes black by the end of the day.

alohaLala.title: indeed
alohaLala.description: I'm in love with this mascara is the best out there, my lashes look AMAZING I been using it for a year.

danie16.title: Not Worth The Money
danie16.description: Not worth the money. The mascara clumps and flakes. It doesn't lift that well and looks very messy.

cmbeautybabe.title: I will never use a different mascara!!
cmbeautybabe.description: I can't believe how amazing this mascara is! Absolutely my favourite!

Seanna99.title: Awesome!
Seanna99.description: This mascara makes my eyelashes extend to a new level. Now you can see my eyelashes with this mascara!

jenjeeeee.title: not the greatest
jenjeeeee.description: This does a decent job of lengthening and thickening, but it flakes off by end of day and there are always black flecks under my eyes. Lots of other mascaras that give same look without the flaking. Had as sample and won't purchase.

lovesmakeup0210.title: Fail
lovesmakeup0210.description:
It breaks my heart to give a low rating because I so love Too Faced. I am kind of a mascara junkie, I have short lashes so I am always looking for the new greatest thing......this was not it, I heard wonderful things about this mascara and I could not wait to try it. I find it to be clumpy and messy, and just did not look good at all. I got mine as a deluxe travel size with a palette, I am glad I did not spend the money for the full size. Dissapointing.
…read more

FaithNoMore.title: Sloppy look, product like paste, lacks precision
FaithNoMore.description:
Before purchasing, I researched mascaras and narrowed it down to a few brands. While in the store, I asked the advice of the salesperson who overwhelming suggested I go with this one. Big mistake. Was excited to try it at home. As soon as I opened the cap, the product looked messy as it oozed out of the container. It was like a thick paste, gloopy, and sticky- not at all the amazing product I'd heard about. The brush was way too bulky, not good for precision. It coated my lashes making them stick together but did little to separate them. The product stung my eyes and made me cry, which created an even bigger mess. I tried to apply an additional coat,but it did nothing- no extra volume. The entire look was sloppy. Maybe if you have long, thick lashes to begin with this product works but if you have thin, wispy lashes, the product is WAY TOO THICK. You couldn't even see the individual lashes. And after removing it with 2 rounds of eye makeup remover, and a cleansing towelette, I still woke up with black gunk under my eyes. I get MUCH better results with brands I've purchased at the drugstore after 3 coats. I wish I had gone with my gut and bought one of the other mascaras I read about. This one is definitely getting returned.
…read more

blueviolets.title: Great mascara
blueviolets.description: First time trying it and really like it. I have long lashes but need more of the fullness and this mascara does it, But it also clumps a bit after 3rd coat. In overall it's a great mascara and I would buy it again.

shockwave.title: Clumps!
shockwave.description: I needed a steel lash comb to undo the mess this made of my lashes. I tried it three time and every time I got a spider lashes.

viajoy.title: Fantastic Product!
viajoy.description:
I bought this mascara on a whim and was incredibly pleased with its results. It made my lashes very voluminous and long looking with even just one coat. Unlike other mascaras that claim to create the false lash effect, this mascara is not clumpy or stiff other similar mascaras always made my lashes stick together while this mascara really separates the lashes effectively. The formula is very wet and it dries on your lashes quite well but does not make them feel like they could break off at any minute. Also, unlike said mascaras this mascara was fairly easy to take off. In the past I have had trouble getting mascaras all the way off; especially those that are heavy and gluey and dry, this mascara, however, comes off with a makeup wipe and a few splashes of water. It is highly pigmented and provides a deep black color that makes even my dark brown eyes pop! Overall I was really pleased with this product, despite its high price point, its results are fantastic. I would recommend this mascara to anyone who is looking for a full, thick, long lash look.
…read more

bjsl.title: LOVE IT!
bjsl.description:
First off I have very short, blond and sparse lashes. I have been using Benefits They're Real since it came out and love that mascara. It did take me some getting use to the brush as its a little stiff and scratchy. Anyways...I had no plans on changing mascaras but something caught my eye about this one so I thought I give it a try. The brush is really large at the end but overall I liked it. This Too Faced BTS really lengthens your lashes, a lot more than They're Real, but I don't think it separates them as well. The Too Faced BTS really keeps the curl of my lashes though, better than any mascara I've tried. I used the Too Faced BTS by itself for over a week and really liked it but than I started using both Too Faced BTS and They're Real together and I get the most amazing results. I know to some people that might seem a little ridiculous to use two mascaras but not to me if I get the results I want. The first day I used both I received several compliments on my lashes. I also have no flaking at all. I really loved the Too Faced BTS by itself but combined with They're Real I get my desired result!
…read more

purpleshadow12.title: HORRIBLE!
purpleshadow12.description:
Marketing at its finest, people. The name sounds great, right? Wrong. First of all, my natural lashes are very long so I always look for the best volumizing mascaras on the market because I do not need length. A beauty advisor recommended this to me so I gave it a shot. The product did not volumize, and it did not define my lashes. They were more of a soft black color so it was not an intense look at all. The worst part? It flaked within 2 hours and most of the product was on my under-eye area. My lashes were light as a feather but that's never the look (or feel) I am trying to achieve.
…read more

Kvarl.title: I do not usually splurge on mascaras but this time I did and I was extremely disappointed. I found this mascara to be extremely clumpy and it left black flakes all over my face. I did not expect this as I paid 30$ for the tube. Waste of money! I will go back to my cheap stuff.

2006BUGABOO.title: The best!
2006BUGABOO.description: Love this no smudge great curl and no clumping. Thick sexy beautiful lashes. My search for great mascara is over. Thanks too face:)

sdarmony.title: dramatic look!
sdarmony.description: People will always ask me if I'm wearing false lashes whenever I have better than sx mascara on. I already bought over 3 tubes it's completely worth it and long lasting !

IcedDoughnut.title: PERFECT!!
IcedDoughnut.description:
I have used the drug store "Falsies" mascara forever. I loved it, but the formula was flakey and it just didn't have enough product in the bottle. I bought my mom the waterproof Better than Sex mascara and she loved it. Finally, I gave this one a try with a 100 point sampler. Wow, 100 points well spent! I bought the full size on my next trip to Sephora. It is AMAZING. It's the closest thing to the voluminous look the Falsies mascara gave me with a way better formula. I have never curled my lashes, but I bet it'd look amazing with this mascara. I used a mascara primer (UD Subversion, highly recommend), but on the run I just put the mascara and it still stays put and pretty. My only recommendation is to buy this original formula (that comes in a pink tube) and NOT the waterproof one (comes in a green tube). The waterproof one has an odd formula that either randomly slips off or will refuse to remove itself for days.
…read more

Millie0126.title: holy grail mascara
