Millie0126.description: I decided to buy this mascara and it was a good decision! I thought it'd be clumpy like everyone says but it doesn't, it makes it so easy to get the volume I like, my holy grail

senior.title: My lashes are long, but thin. Asked consultant for recommendation . She suggested this. It clumps, unless I rub brush first with Kleenex first to remove excess mascara. I would not recommend this.

ruddenca.title: AMAZING, but...
ruddenca.description: Caused terrible panda eyes. I'm so sad b/c this mascara is so dramatically volumizing, yet feathery and natural looking. And can layer on with no clumps! Would seriously be my HG mascara if it weren't for the smudging underneath the eyes, something I never get from other mascaras.

gigisd.title: Artificial
gigisd.description: I had very high expectations for this mascara. When I read the package, my pulse was pounding. Yes, it does lengthen and add lots of volume, but I had dark, crunchy "spider eyes." I have used most every mascara ever manufactured, from drugstore to salon quality, and I found this surprisingly disappointing.

sabeenie.title: good stuff, but go with benefit
sabeenie.description:
Pretty standard mascara, nice and richly saturated black, lengthens and builds volume like it says on the tin. I decided to exchange this one with benefits roller lash because of the brush. I find fluffy brushes trap too much product, allowing the mascara to dry out quicker and not pick up quite enough when you return it to the tube for a refill. Also difficult to comb out, which is an issue for me because I have big lashes that criss cross and tangle naturally. They've gone all out with the packaging though, which seems to have pleased most? Run of the mill overall, just built heavy to feel heavy duty-er.
…read more

ocrissyy.title: flaky
ocrissyy.description: Like others have said on here, it was great the first week and then it started flaking and clumping like crazy. Now, i apply it really slowly so i can avoid major clumping. But i'm never getting it again. Someone recommended it to me but it's not working out for me

nyss15.title: Best mascara
nyss15.description: I have found my grail mascara, it's waterproof but doesn't smudge easy, doesn't irritate my sensitive eyes, and gives my amazing definition and volume!!!!!

myaj17.title: eh
myaj17.description:
I got it this in the small size in an ipsy box and I was so excited because this product is very popular and I wanted to try it out for the longest time. When I did I was kind of disappointed. I naturally have long and dark eyelashes. When I put this on it made them soooo clumpy and they were so hard to separate and it didn't really curl them that much either. It kind of made them go straight out which is my biggest pet peeve with mascara. I feel like if the wand was different it would make this way better. The wand has too much product on it when you take it out of the tube and it just smudges everywhere on your eyes. It did lengthen them but it still looked bad. Not really a fan. Wouldn't buy the full sized product.
…read more

EmmieDonna.title: Its alright...
EmmieDonna.description: This mascara makes my lashes look very long and has lots of volume, but after a few hours of wearing it I start to get raccoon eyes. A little disappointed because this mascara is so hyped up

anbright.title: Not Too Bad
anbright.description:
It does it's job. I use this mascara when I want a really natural lash. It makes my eyelashes look "fluffy"...if that's a thing ;) I love the packaging, but I have a few complaints. Because the wand is huge, it's hard to get close to the lash-line and I also find it a very messy mascara. If you happen to get a few dots on your eyelid, it's very hard to get off and not mess up your eyeshadow. I wouldn't repurchase, but I can use it and get my money's worth.
…read more

yunglolita.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

anniemac1999.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL
anniemac1999.description: This mascara is really quite amazing. I like it so much that I bought it again after I ran out and I'm sure that when I run out of the one I have now. It definitely lengthens and adds a lot of volume to the eyelashes. I took a star off because sometimes it can be a bit flaky, and sometimes when first putting it on it can be a little clumpy, but with enough work with the spooly I can usually get it to unclump.

Lexiloul.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

kortenie.title: clumping
kortenie.description: i got this in in the Better together collection, was not a fan of this. clumpy and gross right away. if I didnt love the rest of the collection so much I would return it. never buying again.

Dayah.title: LOVE this mascara, when its wet. HATE this mascara when it starts drying. This mascara makes my eyelashes super long, thick, curled, and black! Looks like falsies! Downside is, when it starts drying my lashes don't extend as much. Also, lots of it falls on my under eye area.

sassysusan.title: It's a great mascara and gives lots of volume but flakes

Arianne32.title: ehhh
Arianne32.description: I tried this mascara because of the hype around it. It does nothing at all for my lashes and the formula is really watery.

elena95.title: Not that great.
elena95.description: After a few hours it crumbles , and the mascara dries really fast , i had 1 week with it, and it was like a 1-2 months old mascara, i had high hopes for this mascara and just like this mascara they crumbled down.

santosateos.title: WILL NEVER USE ANOTHER MASCARA <3
santosateos.description:
I'll make the story as short as possible-- I used a drug store mascara for about a week. I never before had any problems with drug store mascara but for some reason, this specific one broke my lashes off!!! I had used Benefit's "They're Real" before and loved it then a friend recommended "Better Than Sex" and it RESTORED MY LASHES! I have naturally long lashes, though they're not too full. This mascara restored the length I had before. I'm forever thankful. It's pricey, but a good investment, you will not regret giving this a try.
…read more

Lauren0813.title: pretty amazing!
Lauren0813.description: This mascara is super volumizing and makes lashes look very full. I am giving 4 stars bc it does not lengthen very well, but that is really the only con for me.

ydelgado.title: This mascara is NOT better than $ex,disappointed with this mascara i don't see whats all the hype i prefer benefit's they're real its amazing

mak3uplov3r8.title: One of my favorite!!!
mak3uplov3r8.description: The name is insteresting....when I first tried it I fell in love!

Nonvenomous.title: Best Mascara that I've ever used!
Nonvenomous.description: I was absolutely blown away by this mascara. It does not clump at all and makes your lashes look effortlessly and naturally longer and fuller. One coat looks amazing and I wouldn't use more but if you do it looks like you've got falsies on. Love love love it! Will never use another mascara as long as this one is around.

momCoral.title: it's nice...
momCoral.description:
not better than well, what it claims! Stupid name anyways, but thats what made me buy it! LOL I can't even type that word into the description!! But nice brush, heavy duty formula, stays in place nice, super hard to remove, but great looking full, long, thick spider lashes! But mine broke after 3 uses, the piece that wipes most of the mascara off the brush is always stuck up in the top, or brush.. I can't get it down, even trying it makes my fingers all black...messy. Yuck I just put it a side with the others and moved on to Tarte's newest ..which is super fantastic. I should have returned it...anyone else have that problem?
…read more

cg2345.title: best mascara ever
cg2345.description: If you find this mascar clumpy or hard to work with its most likes the way you are applying it. This mascar gives the best length and shape of my eyelashes, a tip if you find it clumpy is to focus it on the ends of your lashes meaning the tips of all ur lashes and toying a thinner small mascar starting from the root of your lashes

ames1228.title: The girl at the store told me this was the best mascara out there so I tried it. It works great, really makes your lashes look long however I asked her if it was water proof and she said water resistant and she has never had a problem. I took her word for it. The first day of use by the afternoon I had black underneath my eyes from the mascara from just wearing it to work and not encountering any water. I am used to true waterproof mascaras which don't leave any residue on your eyes but other than that it was great, just not for me.

megsny.title: one coat wonder
megsny.description:
This mascara has replaced my former go-to. One coat does the trick. It goes on very smoothly - my lashes look and feel silky. I rarely feel the need to put a second coat on, but when I have, it goes on easily and creates a very dramatic effect. I do not have to use a metal lash comb, whereas with other mascaras I almost always use one. The sole 'downside' is that the end of the brush sometimes has to be blotted before applying, as it often has excess product, but this isn't a big enough factor for me to take away a star. I have bought this for all the females in my family - SO happy I found this product! I feel like a brunette bombshell.
…read more

xoxo1991.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL
xoxo1991.description: After two Hrs. it looked like i had a black eye NO OTHER mascara has done this to me!!! ZERO STARS!

dcgirl511.title: Just OK
dcgirl511.description: This mascara is ok, but I've had many other mascaras of all price ranges that were better. It looks good when you first put it on, but for me it flaked a lot and got in my eyes. It also smudged throughout the day and gave me raccoon eyes. I prefer Benefit or Blinc mascara honestly. Not worth the eye irritation.

anaisalv.title: Best mascara i've ever used (and this comes from someone ADDICTED to mascara, i've tried LOTS!)

sarasaeidi.title: best
sarasaeidi.description: This is the best mascara I've ever had. Im a mascara lover and i'm so picky and i was always put too many coats on to have a super long lashes. After trying many brands I came across to this one And I fell in love with it! Now, I just put one or two coats and I have long lashes....

vans1321.title: no thank you!
vans1321.description: This mascara clumps your lashes like no other mascara! I loved it at first, but 2 weeks later something horrible must've happened because it's extremely tacky and clumpy! No good.

BleedingRed.title: Flakey
BleedingRed.description: I was very excited to get this item for my birthday. I had heard great things! First putting it on, it did as promised. It does give you a lot of volume and length. But, upon wearing it throughout the day, it becomes very flakey. So now I only use it if I'm going out for a few hours.

GlassHips.title: flaky
GlassHips.description: I've used this for about a week and every time it has flaked after only 4 hours of use. I really wanted to like this but unfortunately I do not like the fact it flakes.. Gave it 3 stars for good volume and lengthening but long-term wear and quality wise, it doesn't impress me.

Lor96.title: A make up must-have!
Lor96.description:
For awhile I held off on buying this mascara to see if the hype would go down. You know the drill, a new make up product comes out and all your friends go crazy over it for a month or so and then they find a better product and stop using it. Better than Sex mascara has been out for quite some time now and still so many people love it- so a couple weeks ago I decided to splurge and buy it myself. There were many reviews on here that claimed it was incredibly clumpy so I expected the formula to be goopy and hard to separate my lashes. However that was not the case at all! When applied, I started with bare lashes, typically I use a lash primer but for this I decided to try it without that first. What I first noticed was how very black the mascara went on. I applied a couple coats, as I don't go for the "natural lash" look. I didn't find it to be difficult to apply or clumpy at all while applying it, the formula is creamy but visibly thickens your lashes. It really grabbed each of my lashes and lengthened them. When applied with a lash primer it lengthened my lashes even more. Very happy with this product overall. Will be buying again!
…read more

maisyisadaisy.title: So much length!
maisyisadaisy.description: I love this mascara! With naturally full & thick lashes, I bought it looking for added length & it did not disappoint! Effortlessly made my lashes more full, dark & extremely noticeably longer! I have been using this product ever since!!!

MegAbdalla.title: Not Better than Sex
MegAbdalla.description: This mascara applies very easily and makes your lashes look great without much effort. HOWEVER, every time I have worn this mascara I have been left with flakes running down my face after a few hours of wear. It does not hold well during the day, therefore I will not be buying again.

livelaughlove58.title: wasnt impressed!
livelaughlove58.description: Let me just say I bought this prouduct because of all the hype and amazing things I hear! I was impressed initially when putting on the mascara as t made my lashes long and had lots of volume. But I noticed every time I wore it not too long after it would melt off and be under my eyelids. I ended up returning it because it looked awful thought the day everytime I wore it :(

laurab86.title: 5 stars!
laurab86.description: I finally purchased the full size mascara for this because I was using the smaller ones that came in a set. I have tried so many mascaras and believe that this is the best high end one! You literally only need one swipe and your lashes are transformed! It is worth the price!

agacosta.title: dries quickly
agacosta.description: I wish I was able to enjoy this product more but unfortunately it dried out before I could. Also I didn't see any amazing affects that you couldn't get from a drug store mascara.

btm1998.title: The best out there
btm1998.description: Makes my unimpressive eyelashes look amazing. Cannot recommend this enough

AliciaKeochai.title: UHHHMAZING
AliciaKeochai.description:
Okay, so I never bother with mascara bc I have the straightest Asian eyelashes. I usually just put false lashes over my short straight ones and call it a day bc The curl NEVER stays no matter what mascara I used. I got this as a free sample and OMG IVE BEEN MISSING OUT ALL THESE YEARS!!!!! You bet I got a full size one now. Not only did my curl stay for the ENTIRE day, but my lashes looked longer and fuller!!! (That's a miracle in my case) I 10000% Recommend this mascara. The only con I would say for me personally is that it did transfer a bit under my eyes but that only has to do with my skin being extremely oily. I'll take that over short straight lashes any day!!
…read more

Eac33.title: disappointing
Eac33.description: I was expecting a lot from this product. I enjoy too faced and this mascara did not live up to their brand. It is a nice color, the volume was decent but after a few hours of wear....under eye smudge. I do not rub my eyes and barely touch my face so this was simply from blinking.

greatergatsby.title: Not Worth the Trouble
greatergatsby.description: When I first put this mascara on, it seemed fantastic. It lengthened and thickened my eyelashes, and I thought I had found the perfect mascara. However, during the day it started to smudge, the black pigment actually getting in the creases beneath my eye. I returned it the next day.

mberteig.title: The good and the bad...
mberteig.description:
Overall, I was pleasantly surprised by this mascara. I have not liked any of the other Too Faced mascaras, so this is a first for me! The brush is large and clunky, Works surprisingly well on top lashes, doesn't work at all on bottom lashes, it is way too easy to get mascara everywhere except on the bottom lashes! The brush separates the upper lashes well, with less clumping than other mascaras I have used, another pleasant surprise. I am used to layering mascaras to get the effect I want. This one works all by itself and provides length, volume and curl. Again, I was pleasantly surprised by this, as my lashes never hold a curl, and they are definitely holding one with this product. Another first! I applied 3-4 coats. So far there doesn't appear to be any smearing or fall-out. I agree with other reviewers that too much product comes out on the brush, this is wasteful and the tube should be redesigned so more product is wiped off the brush as you withdraw the brush from the tube. Overall, pretty good!
…read more

Marilyneyvonne.title: It flakes
Marilyneyvonne.description: At the end of the day I had major flaking. It is really too bad because this mascara did a good job as far as volume and lengthening.

lipstickjunkee.title: Definitely NOT better than sex...
lipstickjunkee.description: My eyelashes are thick and this mascara did nothing but create a mess for me. It doesn't separate or add length. I don't like it at all.

ND11.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

beautybelle19.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

floggingmelly.title: Slightly disappointed
floggingmelly.description: This mascara will lengthen and curl your lashes - but it is also quite clumpy and ends up flaking down my face midway through the day. I wanted to love it.

din12.title: I used the whole tube but
din12.description: Honestly , it does do a bit of length & some volume but IT FLAKES SO MUCH under the eyes no matter what . Even if you wear it a short period of time .. Don't waste your 20$ on this ... Look @ others

sare16.title: hit and miss
sare16.description: Love the way the brush loads on the product and gives a very defined look, and the packaging is solid which makes it feel high quality, however, this mascara flakes the entire time I'm wearing it and I've always had it smudge no matter whether I've just applied t or have been wearing it for hours and accidentally touch it.

ShortyLuv.title: Too clumpy
ShortyLuv.description: I had to try this mascara because of the wonderful reviews I read. I returned it the next day. It was too too clumpy. My lashes looked like one big glop mess.

RaeLee6.title: THE BEST MASCARA EVA!
RaeLee6.description: I absolutely love this mascara!!! it does have its flaws though, but overrall a very good product. cons- cant keep in makeup bag will cause you to use too much product... too much of it weighs down your lashes... its very thick, and gets the job done. many people have been commenting on my eyes more and more now that i use it. a little on the expensive side for just mascara but OMG amazing!

AndreaVR.title: MASSIVE LASHES
AndreaVR.description: Best mascara ever, if you need volume and length this is what you need. Also is easy to built up, 1 coat is enough for a natural full length, 2 coats is a more impressive long lashes and 3 coats is a dramatic look. For some people it may fell a little bit heavy (but really.. Its nothing crazy) love it! Must have! Plus the package is cute.

cheriwashere.title: GLAMEROUS MASCARA
cheriwashere.description: I can say this is my holy grail! I can never be without it! this is the first mascara that has ever made me feel glamorous and pretty and if you don't like it you aren't applying it right! There is no comparison. I tried They're Real & Perversion. Does not compare!

momof3dearones.title: Works wonderfully
momof3dearones.description: I received a sample of the Too Faces Better Than Se* (the system wouldn't let me use the "x" - said they detected "profanity" LOL!) mascara and that's all it took! Went straight to the computer and ordered a full-size tube for me, and also one for my teenage daughter, as soon as we used it for the first time. We both absolutely LOVE it!

emmaroberts.title: I love this mascara!
emmaroberts.description: I got this mascara about a month ago and I absolutely love it. My eyelashes are more on the short side and they look extremely long when I use this mascara. It also separates my eyelashes really well. It has been hard for me to find a mascara that separates my eyelashes because they are very thick but this one does it.

NataliaMatusz.title: This is great
NataliaMatusz.description: I have about no eye lashes to begin with, but this mascara actually made it look like I have them! It goes on in sufficient amounts and really volumizes. I do not have to put on a billion coats to get the look I want. It's quick and easy and really is what the name states.

katrinae13.title: i was really hopeful about this mascara because of all the great reviews, but should've read more of the negative reviews... This mascara is very clumpy and flakes off during the course of the day, though it does hold the curl very well until it starts to flake off. I will be returning this very soon.

Cynchaa.title: Disclaimer: I used this as a sample size. Not sure if the fill size product is any different. The sample size gave me clumps. It did make my eyelashes thicker and longer but often became spider-legs looking which I am not down for.

jessicaann8389.title: Disappointed
jessicaann8389.description:
I usually love Too Faced… however their mascaras seriously disappoint me. Their packaging is super cheap. That goes for a compact I got from them too. This really wasn't as amazing as I was expecting it to be…or everyone else has been saying. It was okay but gave me serious clumpy gross lashes. The tube dried out in a week and the brush broke out of the pink part if that makes sense. So disappointed. This has not been the only mascara from them I've had this problem with.
…read more

ChelseaLynnnn.title: SO HAPPY
ChelseaLynnnn.description: I am in absolute love with this mascara. I've been looking for something that would give me that full, long baby doll lash look and this is it!!! So happy :)

Dmmmakeup.title: always dried out
Dmmmakeup.description: I honestly dislike this mascara, every time I get a sample it's all dried out and the brush crests clumps. Always flakey:(

bitchie.title: YASSSSSSSSSS!!!!
bitchie.description: This mascara is EVERYTHING!!! It makes my lashes POP and POW! I'm on love with this product. Also, if you have it on all day it stays nicely and actually lets you reapply in case you are going out after work and need a freshening up. YASSSSSS!! Thank you Too Faced! You are my hero!

Ains09.title: The last mascara you'll buy
Ains09.description: This is hands down the greatest mascara known to mankind! For a girl that has next to no lashes, this mascara makes me look like I was blessed in the lash category.

MellieJlady97.title: LOVE!
MellieJlady97.description: Great mascara! My lashes look amazing and it doesn't flake.

brutumfulmen.title: Great product, not so great applicator
brutumfulmen.description:
This product is great for individuals with long and dense eyelashes. I sometimes have trouble getting my mascara to separate my eyelashes, and this worked really well! I only had some clumping around the outer corner of my eye (understandable, seeing as my eyelashes are super dense in that area). The only downside to this product is the applicator. It's a bit awkward to use and makes getting into the inner corner of the eye difficult.
…read more

roseposey.title: I don't understand the hype for this at all.
roseposey.description: I bought this because it was recommended to me. Very voluminzing, very lengthening but the smudging that I got under my eyes throughout the day was SO BAD. I tried layering this with the Clinique Long-Wearing mascara which was my go to before but it didn't help. Maybe I have more oil around my eyes than average? Idk, this mascara really didn't work for me though.

Erica39.title: Found my new mascara
Erica39.description: I have been trying new mascaras for months now (ever since learning wearing waterproof mascara on a daily basis is a bad idea) and I think this is the one. Smears and flakes are minimal for a non-waterproof formula and I have already received two unsolicited compliments from people who didn't know I had recently switched mascaras.

M3talMuffin.title: Not even better than brussels sprouts
M3talMuffin.description: After reading lots of reviews, I decided to buy this mascara and give it a try. I regretted it as soon as I put it on. It was dry, and didn't lengthen my lashes or give them volume. All it did was clump my short little lashes together. Sorry Too Faced, but you need to rename your mascara. Will not be buying again.

SarahAnnePDX.title: Really IS the best!
SarahAnnePDX.description:
You know how they always have makeup artists saying how they use that cheap pink mascara? I don't buy it. Maybe if you've alre got fake eyelashes on... So, I bought a collection of 5 different mini mascaras that included a coupon for a full sized one that you liked best. This was it, hands down. Full and thick without being clumpy. I've never had a problem with it flaking off. I am a minimalist and often only wear mascara, so it's really important in my book. This one had just a little more than the other four options. I think you'll like it too.
…read more

corijennie.title: Color: Standard Size Black - 0.27 oz/ 8 mL

rachelvl.title: just your average mascara
rachelvl.description:
Let's be real, this product comes in such a cute package and has a stand-out name. I wanted to love this product, but it didn't live up to the hype. I'm a mascara junkie and I love my lashes to look flawless. This product is very comparable to drugstore mascara brands and I believe you can achieve the same look for much cheaper. With that being said, it does lengthen your lashes and do a good job of not clumping, but it will flake off during the day, which is sad.
…read more

AnaGabyArre.title: Best Mascara Ever i just love it, wanna try waterproof version !!

lizziroxx.title: SUPER
lizziroxx.description: LOVE this mascara! pricey but over all good mascara.....

arniea04.title: Voluminous but clumpy
arniea04.description: I really like the results this gives me, but I have to make sure I heat it up before I use it by rolling the tube in my hands- otherwise it clumps a lot. Took me a few uses to get used too, but definitely gives great volume and length!

Francinator.title: It's ok
Francinator.description: Pro: Most voluminous mascara I've ever used and looks great with bold smoky eye Con: It started to flake onto my face within 4 hours! I thought that maybe I had received a bad tube since I've heard so much buzz about this mascara. So I purchased another. Same thing happened. Will not be repurchasing. I'll only use it if I receive a sample.

kimjmtz.title: Messy and Clumpy
kimjmtz.description: This mascara did nothing for me. It was very messy and clumpy, I have to comb my eyelashes out after application. When the mascera dries it is very flaky and falls off.

sandylove2.title: Lots of length and fullness
sandylove2.description: Very volumizing. Made my lashes long and full. Does not clump on my lashes.

Jackiee987.title: It's alright
Jackiee987.description: I like the way this mascara makes my lashes look but....it flakes so bad!

ananunez09.title: This mascara is horrible! I get at least 20 minutes of wear time before I have panda eyes! Also, it gets really clumpy after the second coat.

Baroquep.title: Better than s*x ? I don't think so ...
Baroquep.description: didn't like this mascara. Made my lashes clumpy and lumpy. The only think I did like was it is the blackest black mascara that I've ever used. Hated the brush, far too large and difficult to use. Would never buy this mascara again.

merrill1999.title: OUTSTANDING
merrill1999.description: Great mascara couldn't be more pleased!! Truly is better than sex(I mean maybe)

Noelle436.title: Just Okay
Noelle436.description: Mascara was good the first few times I used it. But I do think too much comes out on the wand making it impossible to get non-clumpy lashes. Does start flaking by end of day leaving the under eye "shadow". Try another mascara, it's definitely not "better than s*x".

savaynaynay.title: Great volumizing mascara
savaynaynay.description: Works great at volumizing, tends to be clumpy until you learn how to use it.

starrfire.title: in loveee
starrfire.description: This mascara is my holy grail I have already went through one and purchased another.... This mascara volumizes, lengthens, and separates and blackens them... It's just that great and works amazingly

sammie88.title: Awesome!
sammie88.description: Love it! Even got asked if I had fake lashes on! Makes lashes thick and mine didn't clump

sourdough.title: A good argument for celibacy
sourdough.description: I hate the name of this mascara, and I wouldn't have bought it except in the collection of mascaras Sephora was selling around Christmas time. The product went on in a rather clumpy manner, thanks to the weirdly shaped brush, and the product rubbed off easily with little provocation. Buy a mascara with a dignified name. It's got to be better than this one.

Megan2193.title: Kind of a let down
Megan2193.description: I was so excited for this product. I actually really love how big the wand is and the first few hours the mascara is amazing! Later in the day it gets really flaky and you have black speckles everywhere. :( so sad

Ceece55.title: horrible
Ceece55.description: honestly terrible. flakes and smudges everywhere. my eyelashes have never looked so clumpy and ugly.

lindalouhoo.title: Need a new makeup bag
lindalouhoo.description: This mascara works great until something within the applicator happens and you end up with huge globs of black mascara everywhere. After this happens, you can clean the wand and applicator off but once you stick it back in, you are right back to square one. So, you have no choice to throw it away. This has happened to me with two tubes.

princessvmb94.title: amazing
princessvmb94.description: I use this as my last mascara after my fiber lash and this mascara is just amazing! I normally have to put 3-4 layers of mascara on and with this one I don't, just one layer! And it stays on all day!

WendyM7.title: I just don't understand the hype. It was very clumpy.

Jeannaxmarie.title: I am IN LOVE! This mascara makes my lashes long, voluminous, and makes my eyes pop! Best mascara I have EVER used. Only reason I put 4 stars is because after a while it does start to flake off. But its an easy fix. Overall, my favorite mascara and I will defiantly be repurchasing.

emilyosborne6.title: the best
emilyosborne6.description:
seriously, buy this. ever since I started wearing makeup i've been trying to achieve Shelley-Duvall-meets-Tammy-Faye-Baker, almost-looks-like-falsies eyelashes from one product with only a couple coats on my blonde, short eyelashes. I've used Bad Gal, Diorshow, and countless others over the years but nothing compares to this product. The versatility is great- one coat gives you a natural look, two or three really bring it home. It doesnt clump or look spidery at all! the only negative is that it does shed a bit and I get a little residue under my bottom lashes by the end of the day, but I just keep this in mind when doing my makeup in the morning and keep my lower line super light so it doesnt look bad by the time I get home. If I were to pick one product from Sephora I couldnt live without, this would be it.
…read more

Ritaah.title: i dont have the flaky problem
Ritaah.description:
Before I bought this I read a lot of reviews on how the product flakes through out the day so I was a little skeptical but wanted to try it. I haven't had any flaking, I do find it clumpy on the wand and I seriously only dip it one time and get the product on both eyes so I guess that's a plus since I don't have to keep dipping the wand back in to get more product. I like it, my eyelashes are so long when I do use it and I'm satisfied.
…read more

EmilyRebeccaRN.title: Smudge Town Express
EmilyRebeccaRN.description: If you're looking for a luxury brand mascara that smudges in literally minutes, this is the one for you.

KOXO.title: Best mascara I have ever used
KOXO.description:
I was forever loyal to Max Factor 2000 calorie mascara --the best mascara around and the only remaining drugstore makeup product for me. Since it was discontinued many years ago I have tried them all and more than once - all the heavy hitters that people recommend - Diorshow, YSL, Lancome Hypnose Drama (my 2nd choice) and Benefit They're Real (dreadful). I don't have long eyelashes and two coats of this looks like I have lash extensions. I see the negative reviews about how the brush gets gooey and clumpy and honestly, take a q-tip or tissue and wipe it off. Not a big deal. Better than the more expensive Diorshow that dries out in a minute. I am on my 4th tube of this. Safe to say this is my mascara now.
…read more

melly09.title: Love it!
melly09.description: I went to a sephora store and was recommended this mascara by one of the employees there. It's amazing mascara! Love how dark it looks and makes your eyelashes look amazing. Would defiantly reccomend this to people.

jasminebryant.title: zero stars.
jasminebryant.description:
this mascara is so over hyped! I bought it because of the ad too faced did with Gigi Gorgeous, products she endorses and raves about so much have always worked well for me. but this mascara is something completely different. the formula is horrible and gooey. too much gets on the brush at once, meaning if you want to be able to use it, you have to wipe off the excess and wast so much of this overpriced mascara. but it still seems like after being wiped off, my lashes were immediately swamped with this goo! it dries so slow, I think I waited 8 minutes? and it isn't buildable at all. it gave my lashes no volume with one coat, but with two they were completely clumped together. and the best part? after fifteen minutes, there are flakes on EVERYTHING. this mascara is horrible.
…read more

madixshay.title: So glad I didn't buy the full size
madixshay.description: I received this product as a 100 point gift with my Sephora points. I'm really not impressed. Granted I don't have long lashes, but this does nothing for them.
